./  ADD  SSI=53080109,NAME=IOEDKGET
         TITLE 'IOEDKGET-3540 GET MODULE                               *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IOEDKGET CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IOEDKGET  75.308'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
*                                                                  0078 00014000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00015000
*   /*                                                               */ 00016000
*   /* PROGRAM INITIALIZATION                                @Y30OECA*/ 00017000
*   /*                                                               */ 00018000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00019000
*                                                                  0078 00020000
*   DCBPTR=REG1;                    /* INIT ADDR OF DCB      @Y30OEAC*/ 00021000
         LR    DCBPTR,REG1                                         0078 00022000
*   AMWKAPTR=DCBAMWKA;              /* GET PTR TO A.M. WKAREA      0079 00023000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00024000
         L     AMWKAPTR,DCBAMWKA+15(,DCBPTR)                       0079 00025000
         LA    AMWKAPTR,0(,AMWKAPTR)                               0079 00026000
*   RPLFDBK=CLEAR;                  /* CLEAR FEED BACK AREA  @Y30OE6D*/ 00027000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0080 00028000
         STCM  @15,7,RPLFDBK(AMWKAPTR)                             0080 00029000
*   RPLRTN=CLEAR;                   /* CLEAR RETURN CODE AREA      0081 00030000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00031000
*                                                                  0081 00032000
         STCM  @15,7,RPLRTN(AMWKAPTR)                              0081 00033000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00034000
*   /*                                                               */ 00035000
*   /* M A I N L I N E                                       @Y30OECA*/ 00036000
*   /*                                                               */ 00037000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00038000
*                                                                  0082 00039000
*   DO WHILE(RTNCD<EODC);           /* FIND A VALID RECORD   @Y30OE6D*/ 00040000
         B     @DE00082                                            0082 00041000
@DL00082 DS    0H                                                  0083 00042000
*     RTNCD=ZERO;                   /* RESET CODE FIELD      @Y30OE6D*/ 00043000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'00'                               0083 00044000
*     IF CCWCMDCD¬=NOP              /* IF NOT END OF CCW CHAIN     0084 00045000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00046000
*       THEN                        /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00047000
         L     @15,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0084 00048000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0084 00049000
         CLI   CCWCMDCD(@15),X'03'                                 0084 00050000
         BE    @RF00084                                            0084 00051000
*       CCWPTR=CCWPTR+LENGTH(JAMCCW);/* INDEX TO NEXT CCW    @Y30OE6D*/ 00052000
         AL    @15,@CF00130                                        0085 00053000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWPTR(AMWKAPTR)                              0085 00054000
*     ELSE                                                         0086 00055000
*       ;                           /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00056000
@RF00084 DS    0H                                                  0087 00057000
*     IF CCWCMDCD=NOP               /* END OF CCW CHAIN      @Y30OE6D*/ 00058000
*       THEN                        /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00059000
         L     @15,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0087 00060000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0087 00061000
         CLI   CCWCMDCD(@15),X'03'                                 0087 00062000
         BNE   @RF00087                                            0087 00063000
*                                                                  0088 00064000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00065000
*       /*                                                           */ 00066000
*       /* SEGMENT(EOB)REQUEST                                       */ 00067000
*       /*                                                           */ 00068000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00069000
*                                                                  0088 00070000
*       DO;                                                        0088 00071000
*         GOTO EOB;                                                0089 00072000
         B     EOB                                                 0089 00073000
*EOB#:                                                             0090 00074000
*       END;                        /* GO TO THE EOB ROUTINE @Y30OE6D*/ 00075000
EOB#     DS    0H                                                  0091 00076000
*     IF RTNCD=ZERO                 /* EOB CONDITION         @Y30OE6D*/ 00077000
*       THEN                        /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00078000
@RF00087 CLI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),0                                   0091 00079000
         BNE   @RF00091                                            0091 00080000
*       IF CCWDV=OFF                /* CHECK FOR A GOOD RECORD     0092 00081000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00082000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00083000
         L     @15,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0092 00084000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0092 00085000
         TM    CCWDV(@15),B'10000000'                              0092 00086000
         BNZ   @RF00092                                            0092 00087000
*         RTNCD=GOOD;               /* SET GOOD DATA FOUND IND     0093 00088000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00089000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'7F'                               0093 00090000
*       ELSE                        /* OTHERWISE             @Y30OE6D*/ 00091000
*         CCWDV=OFF;                /* RESET INVALID DATA BIT      0094 00092000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00093000
         B     @RC00092                                            0094 00094000
@RF00092 L     @15,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0094 00095000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0094 00096000
         NI    CCWDV(@15),B'01111111'                              0094 00097000
*   END;                            /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00098000
@RC00092 DS    0H                                                  0095 00099000
@RF00091 DS    0H                                                  0095 00100000
@DE00082 CLI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),8                                   0095 00101000
         BL    @DL00082                                            0095 00102000
*   RPLFDBK=RPLRTN;                 /* SET RETURN CODES IN RPL     0096 00103000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00104000
         MVC   RPLFDBK(3,AMWKAPTR),RPLRTN(AMWKAPTR)                0096 00105000
*   IF RTNCD=GOOD                   /* WAS A GOOD RECORD FOUND     0097 00106000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00107000
*     THEN                          /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00108000
         CLI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),127                                 0097 00109000
         BNE   @RF00097                                            0097 00110000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00111000
*       RPLFDBK1=ZERO;              /* ZERO 1ST BYTO OF RPL RC     0099 00112000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00113000
         MVI   RPLFDBK1(AMWKAPTR),X'00'                            0099 00114000
*       RPLRLEN=ACBLRECL;           /* SET LNG OF DATA IN RPL      0100 00115000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00116000
         LH    @15,ACBLRECL(,AMWKAPTR)                             0100 00117000
         ST    @15,RPLRLEN(,AMWKAPTR)                              0100 00118000
*       USERWORK=AMWORK(1:ACBLRECL);/* GIVE RECORD TO USER   @Y30OE6D*/ 00119000
         L     @14,RPLAREA(,AMWKAPTR)                              0101 00120000
         MVI   USERWORK+1(@14),C' '                                0101 00121000
         MVC   USERWORK+2(126,@14),USERWORK+1(@14)                 0101 00122000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0101 00123000
         L     @11,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0101 00124000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0101 00125000
         L     @11,CCWDATAD-1(,@11)                                0101 00126000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0101 00127000
         EX    @15,@SM00838                                        0101 00128000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00129000
*   ELSE                            /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00130000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00131000
         B     @RC00097                                            0103 00132000
@RF00097 DS    0H                                                  0104 00133000
*       RFY                                                        0104 00134000
*         R15 RSTD;                 /* RESTRICT WORK REG     @Y30OE6D*/ 00135000
*       IF RTNCD=IOERR              /* IF I/O ERROR OCCURRED @Y30OE6D*/ 00136000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00137000
         CLI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),12                                  0105 00138000
         BNE   @RF00105                                            0105 00139000
*         R15=EXLSYNP;              /* GET ADDR OF SYNAD EXIT      0106 00140000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00141000
         L     R15,EXLSYNP(,AMWKAPTR)                              0106 00142000
*       IF RTNCD=EODC               /* IF EOD DETECTED       @Y30OE6D*/ 00143000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00144000
@RF00105 CLI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),8                                   0107 00145000
         BNE   @RF00107                                            0107 00146000
*         R15=EXLEODP;              /* GET ADDR OF EODAD EXIT      0108 00147000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00148000
         L     R15,EXLEODP(,AMWKAPTR)                              0108 00149000
*       RFY                         /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00150000
*         SAVREG RSTD;              /* RESTRICT SAVREG       @Y30OE95*/ 00151000
@RF00107 DS    0H                                                  0110 00152000
*       SAVREG=ADDR(REGSAVE);       /* PTR TO REG SAVEAREA   @Y30OE95*/ 00153000
         LA    SAVREG,REGSAVE(,AMWKAPTR)                           0110 00154000
*       GENERATE;                                                  0111 00155000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00156000
REG2DISP EQU   28                   DISP TO REG2 IN REGSAVE   @Y30OE6D  00157000
         ST    SAVREG,0(0,@13)      SAVE PTR TO MY REGS       @Y30OE95  00158000
         STM   @14,@12,0(SAVREG)    SAVE MY REGISTERS         @Y30OE95  00159000
         LM    @02,@12,REG2DISP(@13) RESTORE CALLERS REGS     @Y30OE6D  00160000
         BALR  @14,@15              GO TO CALLERS ERR ROUT    @Y30OE6D  00161000
*                                                             @Y30OE6D  00162000
*  CALLERS ERROR ROUTINE TO OPTIONALLY RETURN HERE.           @Y30OE6D  00163000
*  REGISTER 13 MUST STILL POINT TO CALLERS SAVE AREA.         @Y30OE6D  00164000
*                                                             @Y30OE6D  00165000
         STM   @02,@12,REG2DISP(@13) SAVE CALLERS REGS        @Y30OE6D  00166000
         L     SAVREG,0(@13)        SET PTR TO MY SAVE AREA   @Y30OE95  00167000
         LM    @14,@12,0(SAVREG)    RESTORE MY REGS           @Y30OE95  00168000
*       RFY                                                        0112 00169000
*         SAVREG UNRSTD;            /* UNRESTRICT SAVREG     @Y30OE95*/ 00170000
*       RFY                                                        0113 00171000
*         R15 UNRSTD;               /* RELEASE REG           @Y30OE6D*/ 00172000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00173000
*/*                                  RETURN TO THE CALLER    @Y30OE6D*/ 00174000
*                                                                  0115 00175000
*                                                                  0115 00176000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OECA*/ 00177000
*/* END OF BLOCK ROUTINE - ENTERED WHEN ALL DATA RECORDS IN  @Y30OECA*/ 00178000
*/* THE LAST BLOCK HAVE BEEN PASSED TO THE USER AND THE NEXT @Y30OECA*/ 00179000
*/* RECORD IS REQUESTED.  THE IOB SEEK CYLINDER IS COMPARED  @Y30OECA*/ 00180000
*/* WITH THE DEB EOD CYLINDER ADDRESS (SET BY SETDISKT) TO   @Y30OECA*/ 00181000
*/* DETERMINE IF END OF DATA HAS BEEN REACHED.  IF SO, THE   @Y30OECA*/ 00182000
*/* END OF DATA ROUTINE IS CALLED.  IF NOT, THE IOB SEEK     @Y30OECA*/ 00183000
*/* CYLINDER IS UPDATED (BY 2 TO BYPASS THE CYLINDER BEING   @Y30OECA*/ 00184000
*/* READ BY THE OTHER IOB) AND THE CCW CHAIN IS SHORTENED IF @Y30OECA*/ 00185000
*/* THE LAST CYLINDER OF THE DATA SET IS TO BE READ AND IS   @Y30OECA*/ 00186000
*/* NOT COMPLETE.  THE DEB EOD ADDRESS INDICATES THE NUMBER  @Y30OECA*/ 00187000
*/* OF RECORDS TO BE READ, N, AND THE (N+1)TH READ CCW IS    @Y30OECA*/ 00188000
*/* EXCHANGED WITH THE FINAL NOP CCW.  (SETDISKT EOV OR      @Y30OECA*/ 00189000
*/* CLOSE PROCESSING WILL RECONSTRUCT THE CCW CHAIN.)  EXCP  @Y30OECA*/ 00190000
*/* IS THEN ISSUED ON THE IOB.                               @Y30OECA*/ 00191000
*/* THE JAMBUFR IOB POINTER IS NEXT SWITCHED TO THE OTHER    @Y30OECA*/ 00192000
*/* IOB AND WAIT IS ISSUED ON ITS ECB.  THE ECB COMPLETION   @Y30OECA*/ 00193000
*/* CODE IS TESTED AND THE RPL FEED BACK CODE IS SET.        @Y30OECA*/ 00194000
*/* THE JAMBUFR CCW POINTER IS SWITCHED TO THE FIRST READ    @Y30OECA*/ 00195000
*/* CCW ASSOCIATED WITH THE NEW IOB.                         @Y30OECA*/ 00196000
*/*                                                          @Y30OECA*/ 00197000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OECA*/ 00198000
*                                                                  0115 00199000
*                                                                  0115 00200000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00201000
*   /*                                                               */ 00202000
*   /* SEGMENT(EOB)START                                             */ 00203000
*   /*                                                               */ 00204000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00205000
*                                                                  0115 00206000
*   DO;                                                            0115 00207000
@RC00097 DS    0H                                                  0116 00208000
*     GOTO EOB@;                                                   0116 00209000
         B     EOB@                                                0116 00210000
*EOB:                                                              0117 00211000
*   END;                            /* START OF EOB SUBROUTINE     0117 00212000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00213000
EOB      DS    0H                                                  0118 00214000
*   IF IOBSKTT=AMWEODTT THEN        /* END OF DATA ?         @Y30OE95*/ 00215000
*                                                                  0118 00216000
         L     @15,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0118 00217000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0118 00218000
         CLC   IOBSKTT(1,@15),AMWEODTT(AMWKAPTR)                   0118 00219000
         BNE   @RF00118                                            0118 00220000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00221000
*     /*                                                             */ 00222000
*     /* SEGMENT(EOD)REQUEST                                         */ 00223000
*     /*                                                             */ 00224000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00225000
*                                                                  0119 00226000
*     DO;                                                          0119 00227000
*       GOTO EOD;                                                  0120 00228000
         B     EOD                                                 0120 00229000
*EOD#:                                                             0121 00230000
*     END;                          /* GO TO EOD SUBROUTINE  @Y30OE6D*/ 00231000
*   ELSE                                                           0122 00232000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OECA*/ 00233000
         B     @RC00118                                            0122 00234000
@RF00118 DS    0H                                                  0123 00235000
*       IOBSKTT=IOBSKTT+IOBNO;      /* SEEK NEXT CYL.        @Y30OECA*/ 00236000
         L     @15,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0123 00237000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0123 00238000
         SLR   @00,@00                                             0123 00239000
         IC    @00,IOBSKTT(,@15)                                   0123 00240000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0123 00241000
         IC    @14,IOBNO(,AMWKAPTR)                                0123 00242000
         ALR   @00,@14                                             0123 00243000
         STC   @00,IOBSKTT(,@15)                                   0123 00244000
*       IF IOBSKTT>AMWEODTT THEN                                   0124 00245000
         CLC   IOBSKTT(1,@15),AMWEODTT(AMWKAPTR)                   0124 00246000
         BH    @RT00124                                            0124 00247000
*         ;                         /* WAIT FINAL I/O        @Y30OE95*/ 00248000
*       ELSE                                                       0126 00249000
*         DO;                       /* SET UP NEXT I/O       @Y30OECA*/ 00250000
*           IF IOBSKTT¬<AMWEODTT THEN/* LAST CYL             @Y30OE95*/ 00251000
         L     @15,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0127 00252000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0127 00253000
         CLC   IOBSKTT(1,@15),AMWEODTT(AMWKAPTR)                   0127 00254000
         BL    @RF00127                                            0127 00255000
*             DO;                   /* SHORTEN CCW CHAIN     @Y30OECA*/ 00256000
*               IF AMWEODSS¬=LASTREC/* IF LAST TRACK IS A    @Y30OE95*/ 00257000
*                 THEN              /* FULL TRACK READ,      @Y30OE6D*/ 00258000
         CLI   AMWEODSS(AMWKAPTR),26                               0129 00259000
         BE    @RF00129                                            0129 00260000
*                 DO;               /* DON'T SWAP CCW'S      @Y30OE6D*/ 00261000
*                   RFY                                            0131 00262000
*                     CCWREG RSTD;  /* RESTRICT REG          @Y30OE6D*/ 00263000
*                   CCWREG=IOBSTART+(FACTOR2*LENGTH(JAMCCW))+/*    0132 00264000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00265000
*                       (LENGTH(JAMCCW)*AMWEODSS);/*         @Y30OE95*/ 00266000
         L     @15,IOBSTART(,@15)                                  0132 00267000
         LA    CCWREG,16                                           0132 00268000
         ALR   CCWREG,@15                                          0132 00269000
         SLR   @00,@00                                             0132 00270000
         IC    @00,AMWEODSS(,AMWKAPTR)                             0132 00271000
         SLA   @00,3                                               0132 00272000
         ALR   CCWREG,@00                                          0132 00273000
*                   SOMECCW=SOMECCW&&NOPCCW;/* SWAP          @Y30OE6D*/ 00274000
         AL    @15,@CF00812                                        0133 00275000
         XC    SOMECCW(8,CCWREG),NOPCCW(@15)                       0133 00276000
*                   NOPCCW=NOPCCW&&SOMECCW;/* NOP            @Y30OE6D*/ 00277000
         XC    NOPCCW(8,@15),SOMECCW(CCWREG)                       0134 00278000
*                   SOMECCW=SOMECCW&&NOPCCW;/* CCW           @Y30OE6D*/ 00279000
         XC    SOMECCW(8,CCWREG),NOPCCW(@15)                       0135 00280000
*/*                             AT CURRENT END OF CCW CHAIN  @Y30OE6D*/ 00281000
*                                                                  0136 00282000
*                   RFY                                            0136 00283000
*                     CCWREG UNRSTD;/* RELEASE REG           @Y30OE6D*/ 00284000
*                 END;              /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00285000
*             END;                  /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00286000
@RF00129 DS    0H                                                  0139 00287000
*           ECB=ECB&&ECB;           /* CLEAR ECB             @Y30OE6D*/ 00288000
@RF00127 L     @15,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0139 00289000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0139 00290000
         L     @14,IOBECBPB-1(,@15)                                0139 00291000
         LA    @14,0(,@14)                                         0139 00292000
         XC    ECB(4,@14),ECB(@14)                                 0139 00293000
*           IOREG=IOBPTR;           /* GET POINTER TO IOB    @Y30OE6D*/ 00294000
         LR    IOREG,@15                                           0140 00295000
*           GEN;                                                   0141 00296000
*                                      /* GEN READ I/O CODE @Y30OE6D*/  00297000
                        EXCP (IOREG)      READ RECORD         @Y30OE6D  00298000
*         END;                      /*                       @Y30OECA*/ 00299000
*       IOBPTR=IOBNIOBB+LENGTH(IOBORG01);/* FLIP             @Y30OE6D*/ 00300000
@RT00124 LA    @15,16                                              0143 00301000
         L     @14,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0143 00302000
         LA    @14,0(,@14)                                         0143 00303000
         SLR   @14,@15                                             0143 00304000
         LA    @00,8                                               0143 00305000
         L     @14,IOBNIOBB-1(,@14)                                0143 00306000
         LA    @14,0(,@14)                                         0143 00307000
         ALR   @00,@14                                             0143 00308000
         STCM  @00,7,IOBPTR(AMWKAPTR)                              0143 00309000
*/*                                       TO THE OTHER IOB   @Y30OE6D*/ 00310000
*                                                                  0144 00311000
*       CCWPTR=IOBSTART+            /* POINT TO READ CCW     @Y30OE6D*/ 00312000
*           (FACTOR2*LENGTH(JAMCCW));/*                      @Y30OE6D*/ 00313000
         LR    @14,@00                                             0144 00314000
         AL    @15,IOBSTART(,@14)                                  0144 00315000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWPTR(AMWKAPTR)                              0144 00316000
*       IOREG=IOBECBPB;             /* GET ADDR OF ECB       @Y30OE6D*/ 00317000
         LR    @15,@00                                             0145 00318000
         L     @15,IOBECBPB-1(,@15)                                0145 00319000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0145 00320000
         LR    IOREG,@15                                           0145 00321000
*       IF ECBCOMP¬=ON              /* IS ECB ALREADY POSTED @Y30OE6D*/ 00322000
*         THEN                      /* NO, ISSUE WAIT        @Y30OE6D*/ 00323000
         TM    ECBCOMP(@15),B'01000000'                            0146 00324000
         BO    @RF00146                                            0146 00325000
*         GEN;                                                     0147 00326000
*                                 /* GEN WAIT I/O CODE      @Y30OE6D*/  00327000
                 WAIT ECB=(IOREG)    WAIT FOR COMPLETITION    @Y30OE6D  00328000
*         IF ECBSTAT¬=GOOD THEN     /* ANY I/O ERRORS?       @Y30OECA*/ 00329000
@RF00146 L     @15,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0148 00330000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0148 00331000
         L     @15,IOBECBPB-1(,@15)                                0148 00332000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0148 00333000
         CLI   ECBSTAT(@15),X'7F'                                  0148 00334000
         BE    @RF00148                                            0148 00335000
*           DO;                     /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00336000
*             RTNCD=IOERR;          /* SET ERROR CODE        @Y30OECA*/ 00337000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'0C'                               0150 00338000
*             CNDCD1=CNDCODE;       /* SET CONDITION CODE 1  @Y30OEAC*/ 00339000
         MVI   CNDCD1(AMWKAPTR),X'04'                              0151 00340000
*           END;                    /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00341000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OECA*/ 00342000
*                                                                  0153 00343000
@RF00148 DS    0H                                                  0154 00344000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00345000
*   /*                                                               */ 00346000
*   /* SEGMENT(EOB)FINISH                                            */ 00347000
*   /*                                                               */ 00348000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00349000
*                                                                  0154 00350000
*   DO;                                                            0154 00351000
@RC00118 DS    0H                                                  0155 00352000
*     GOTO EOB#;                                                   0155 00353000
         B     EOB#                                                0155 00354000
*EOB@:                                                             0156 00355000
*   END;                            /* END OF EOB SUBROUTINE @Y30OE6D*/ 00356000
EOB@     DS    0H                                                  0157 00357000
*                                                                  0157 00358000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OECA*/ 00359000
*/* END OF DATA ROUTINE - ENTERED WHEN THE LAST RECORD OF    @Y30OECA*/ 00360000
*/* THE DATA SET ON THE CURRENTLY MOUNTED DISKETTE HAS BEEN  @Y30OECA*/ 00361000
*/* PASSED TO THE USER.  IF THE DATA SET CONTINUES ON THE    @Y30OECA*/ 00362000
*/* NEXT DISKETTE, SETDISKT IS ISSUED TO CLOSE THE CURRENT   @Y30OECA*/ 00363000
*/* DISKETTE AND OPEN THE NEXT ONE.  THE RPL FEED BACK AREA  @Y30OECA*/ 00364000
*/* IS USED TO INDICATE THE EODAD EXIT SHOULD BE TAKEN OR    @Y30OECA*/ 00365000
*/* THAT PROCESSING WILL CONTINUE WITH THE NEXT VOLUME.      @Y30OECA*/ 00366000
*/* THE SETDISKT PARAMETER LIST IS BUILT IN THE JAMBUFR      @Y30OECA*/ 00367000
*/* WORKA FIELD TO INSURE REENTRANCY                         @Y30OECA*/ 00368000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OECA*/ 00369000
*                                                                  0157 00370000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00371000
*   /*                                                               */ 00372000
*   /* SEGMENT(EOD)START                                             */ 00373000
*   /*                                                               */ 00374000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00375000
*                                                                  0157 00376000
*   DO;                                                            0157 00377000
*     GOTO EOD@;                                                   0158 00378000
         B     EOD@                                                0158 00379000
*EOD:                                                              0159 00380000
*   END;                            /* START OF EOD SUBROUTINE     0159 00381000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00382000
EOD      DS    0H                                                  0160 00383000
*   IF AMWMULTI='1'B THEN           /* MULTI-VOLUME FILE ?   @Y30OE95*/ 00384000
         TM    AMWMULTI(AMWKAPTR),B'10000000'                      0160 00385000
         BNO   @RF00160                                            0160 00386000
*     DO;                           /* SET UP SETDISK PARMS  @Y30OECA*/ 00387000
*       SETDOPCD=EOV;               /* EOV OP CODE           @Y30OE95*/ 00388000
         MVI   SETDOPCD(AMWKAPTR),X'02'                            0162 00389000
*       SETDDCB=DCBPTR;             /* PTR TO DCB            @Y30OEAC*/ 00390000
         ST    DCBPTR,SETDDCB(,AMWKAPTR)                           0163 00391000
*       SETDDSID=AMWDSID;           /* PUT IN DATA SET NAME  @Y30OE95*/ 00392000
         MVC   SETDDSID(8,AMWKAPTR),AMWDSID(AMWKAPTR)              0164 00393000
*       SDTPLPTR=ADDR(SETDLIST);    /* POINT TO LIST         @Y30OE95*/ 00394000
         LA    SDTPLPTR,SETDLIST(,AMWKAPTR)                        0165 00395000
*       RFY                                                        0166 00396000
*         R13 RSTD;                 /* RESTRICT REGISTER     @Y30OEAC*/ 00397000
*       R13SAVE=R13;                /* SAVE REG SAVE AREA PTR      0167 00398000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00399000
         ST    R13,R13SAVE(,AMWKAPTR)                              0167 00400000
*       R13=ADDR(REGSAVE);          /* GET REG SAV AREA ADDR @Y30OEAC*/ 00401000
         LA    R13,REGSAVE(,AMWKAPTR)                              0168 00402000
*       CALL IOESDKTI;              /* GO TO DO EOV PROCESS  @Y30OE95*/ 00403000
         L     @15,@CV00814                                        0169 00404000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0169 00405000
*       R13=R13SAVE;                /* RESTORE SAVE AREA PTR @Y30OEAC*/ 00406000
         L     R13,R13SAVE(,AMWKAPTR)                              0170 00407000
*       RFY                                                        0171 00408000
*         R13 UNRSTD;               /* RELEASE REGISTER      @Y30OEAC*/ 00409000
*       IF ERTNCDE=ZERO             /* GOOD EOV ?            @Y30OE6D*/ 00410000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00411000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(AMWKAPTR),0                                 0172 00412000
         BNE   @RF00172                                            0172 00413000
*         DO;                       /* CONTINUE              @Y30OE95*/ 00414000
*           RTNCD=EOVC;             /* YES, SET GOOD EOV IND @Y30OE6D*/ 00415000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'01'                               0174 00416000
*           CNDCD1=EOVCODE;         /* INDICATE EOV FEED     @ZA04466*/ 00417000
         MVI   CNDCD1(AMWKAPTR),X'10'                              0175 00418000
*         END;                      /* END OF DO             @Y30OE95*/ 00419000
*       ELSE                        /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00420000
*         IF ERTNCDE=IOCODE         /* IF I/O ERROR OCCURRED @Y30OE6D*/ 00421000
*           THEN                    /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00422000
         B     @RC00172                                            0177 00423000
@RF00172 CLI   ERTNCDE(AMWKAPTR),16                                0177 00424000
         BNE   @RF00177                                            0177 00425000
*           DO;                     /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00426000
*             RTNCD=IOERR;          /* YES, SET I/O ERR IND  @Y30OE6D*/ 00427000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'0C'                               0179 00428000
*             CNDCD1=ERTNCDQL;      /* SET CONDITION CODE 1  @Y30OE78*/ 00429000
         MVC   CNDCD1(1,AMWKAPTR),ERTNCDQL(AMWKAPTR)               0180 00430000
*           END;                    /* END OF DO             @Y30OE95*/ 00431000
*         ELSE                      /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00432000
*           DO;                     /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00433000
         B     @RC00177                                            0182 00434000
@RF00177 DS    0H                                                  0183 00435000
*             RTNCD=EODC;           /* EOD OCCURRED, SET INDS      0183 00436000
*                                                            @Y30OE6D*/ 00437000
         MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'08'                               0183 00438000
*             CNDCD1=EOVERR;        /* SET CONDITION CODE 1  @ZA04466*/ 00439000
         MVI   CNDCD1(AMWKAPTR),X'14'                              0184 00440000
*             IF ERTNCDE=EOVERR     /* IF DSKT ENCOUNTERED   @Y30OE6D*/ 00441000
*               THEN                /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00442000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(AMWKAPTR),20                                0185 00443000
         BNE   @RF00185                                            0185 00444000
*               CNDCD2=CNDCODE;     /* SET CONDITION CODE 2  @Y30OE6D*/ 00445000
         MVI   CNDCD2(AMWKAPTR),X'04'                              0186 00446000
*           END;                    /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00447000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00448000
*   ELSE                            /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00449000
*     RTNCD=EODC;                   /* SET EOD INDICATOR     @Y30OE6D*/ 00450000
*                                                                  0189 00451000
         B     @RC00160                                            0189 00452000
@RF00160 MVI   RTNCD(AMWKAPTR),X'08'                               0189 00453000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00454000
*   /*                                                               */ 00455000
*   /* SEGMENT(EOD)FINISH                                            */ 00456000
*   /*                                                               */ 00457000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00458000
*                                                                  0190 00459000
*   DO;                                                            0190 00460000
@RC00160 DS    0H                                                  0191 00461000
*     GOTO EOD#;                                                   0191 00462000
         B     EOD#                                                0191 00463000
*EOD@:                                                             0192 00464000
*   END;                            /* END OF EOD SUBROUTINE @Y30OE6D*/ 00465000
*   END IOEDKGET                    /* END OF MODULE         @Y30OE95*/ 00466000

./  ADD  SSI=42970106,NAME=IOEDKMSG
         TITLE 'IOEDKMSG - VS2 3540 MESSAGE MODULE                     *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IOEDKMSG CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IOEDKMSG  74.297'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00014000
         LA    @14,@SA00001                                        0001 00015000
         ST    @14,8(,@13)                                         0001 00016000
         LR    @13,@14                                             0001 00017000
*   PARMLPTR = R1;                 /* SAVE PTR TO PARMLIST   @Y30OE62*/ 00018000
         LR    PARMLPTR,R1                                         0072 00019000
*   MSGPTR = MSGLPTR(MSGNDEX);     /* POINT TO MESSAGE       @Y30OE62*/ 00020000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0073 00021000
         IC    @15,MSGNDEX(,PARMLPTR)                              0073 00022000
         SLA   @15,2                                               0073 00023000
         L     MSGPTR,MSGLPTR-4(@15)                               0073 00024000
*   IF MCODE = WTOR THEN           /* IS IT A WTOR ?         @Y30OE62*/ 00025000
         CLI   MCODE(PARMLPTR),2                                   0074 00026000
         BNE   @RF00074                                            0074 00027000
*     DO;                          /* YES,                   @Y30OE62*/ 00028000
*       TXTNDEX = 12;              /* INDEX TO TEXT          @Y30OE62*/ 00029000
         LA    TXTNDEX,12                                          0076 00030000
*       MLNDEX = 8;                /* INDEX TO MSG LENGTH    @Y30OE62*/ 00031000
         LA    MLNDEX,8                                            0077 00032000
*     END;                                                 /*@Y30OE62*/ 00033000
*   ELSE                           /* NOT A WTOR             @Y30OE62*/ 00034000
*     DO;                                                  /*@Y30OE62*/ 00035000
         B     @RC00074                                            0079 00036000
@RF00074 DS    0H                                                  0080 00037000
*       IF MCODE = WRITECHK THEN   /* IS IT A WRITE ?        @Y30OE62*/ 00038000
         CLI   MCODE(PARMLPTR),3                                   0080 00039000
         BNE   @RF00080                                            0080 00040000
*          TXTNDEX = 8;            /* INDEX TO TEXT          @Y30OE62*/ 00041000
         LA    TXTNDEX,8                                           0081 00042000
*       ELSE                       /* IT'S A WTO             @Y30OE62*/ 00043000
*         TXTNDEX = 4;             /* INDEX TO TEXT          @Y30OE62*/ 00044000
         B     @RC00080                                            0082 00045000
@RF00080 LA    TXTNDEX,4                                           0082 00046000
*       MLNDEX = 0;                /* INDEX TO MSG LENGTH    @Y30OE62*/ 00047000
@RC00080 SLR   MLNDEX,MLNDEX                                       0083 00048000
*     END;                                                 /*@Y30OE62*/ 00049000
*   MSGLNPTR = MSGPTR+MLNDEX;      /* POINT TO MSG LENGTH    @Y30OE62*/ 00050000
@RC00074 LR    MSGLNPTR,MSGPTR                                     0085 00051000
         ALR   MSGLNPTR,MLNDEX                                     0085 00052000
*   MSGBUFF(1:MLEN+TXTNDEX)=MESSAGE;                       /*@Y30OE62*/ 00053000
         LR    @11,TXTNDEX                                         0086 00054000
         AH    @11,MLEN(,MSGLNPTR)                                 0086 00055000
         BCTR  @11,0                                               0086 00056000
         EX    @11,@SM00685                                        0086 00057000
*                                  /* MOVE MESSAGE, FROM     @Y30OE62*/ 00058000
*                                  /* START TO LAST BYTE     @Y30OE62*/ 00059000
*                                  /* OF TEXT, TO BUFFER     @Y30OE62*/ 00060000
*   TXTNPTR = PARMLPTR+12;         /* POINT TO FIRST         @Y30OE62*/ 00061000
         LA    TXTNPTR,12                                          0087 00062000
         ALR   TXTNPTR,PARMLPTR                                    0087 00063000
*                                  /* TEXT ENTRY             @Y30OE62*/ 00064000
*   BFMLPTR = ADDR(MSGBUFF)+MLNDEX;                        /*@Y30OE62*/ 00065000
         LA    BFMLPTR,MSGBUFF                                     0088 00066000
         ALR   BFMLPTR,MLNDEX                                      0088 00067000
*                                  /* POINT TO MSG LENGTH    @Y30OE62*/ 00068000
*                                  /* FIELD IN BUFFER        @Y30OE62*/ 00069000
*   DO WHILE (KEYCHK¬= ENDLIST);   /* PROCESS UNTIL END      @Y30OE62*/ 00070000
         B     @DE00089                                            0089 00071000
@DL00089 DS    0H                                                  0090 00072000
*                                  /* PARMLIST INDICATED     @Y30OE62*/ 00073000
*     MTXTPTR = ADDR(MSGBUFF)+TXTNDEX;                     /*@Y30OE62*/ 00074000
         LA    MTXTPTR,MSGBUFF                                     0090 00075000
         ALR   MTXTPTR,TXTNDEX                                     0090 00076000
*                                  /* POINT TO FIRST BYTE    @Y30OE62*/ 00077000
*                                  /* OF MSG TEXT            @Y30OE62*/ 00078000
*     IF KEYCHK ¬=SKIPNTRY THEN    /* PROCESS THIS ENTRY?    @Y30OE62*/ 00079000
         CLI   KEYCHK(TXTNPTR),X'00'                               0091 00080000
         BE    @RF00091                                            0091 00081000
*       DO;                        /* YES,                   @Y30OE62*/ 00082000
*         IF LOPBIT = ON THEN      /* HI-ORDER BIT ON?       @Y30OE62*/ 00083000
         TM    LOPBIT(TXTNPTR),B'10000000'                         0093 00084000
         BNO   @RF00093                                            0093 00085000
*           LOPFLAG = ON;          /* TURN ON LOPFLAG        @Y30OE62*/ 00086000
         OI    LOPFLAG,B'10000000'                                 0094 00087000
*         ELSE                     /* IF OFF,                @Z30OE78*/ 00088000
*           LOPFLAG=OFF;           /* TURN OFF LOPFLAG       @Z30OE78*/ 00089000
         B     @RC00093                                            0095 00090000
@RF00093 NI    LOPFLAG,B'01111111'                                 0095 00091000
*         WRKKEY = KEYCHK;         /* MOVE KEY TO WORK AREA  @Y30OE62*/ 00092000
@RC00093 MVC   WRKKEY(1),KEYCHK(TXTNPTR)                           0096 00093000
*         WRKKEY1 = OFF;           /* TURN OFF HI-ORDER BIT  @Y30OE62*/ 00094000
         NI    WRKKEY1,B'01111111'                                 0097 00095000
*         DO MTXTPTR=ADDR(MSGBUFF)+TXTNDEX TO/* SCAN TEXT    @Z30OE78*/ 00096000
*             ADDR(MSGBUFF)+TXTNDEX+MLEN-4/* TO FIND KEY     @Z30OE78*/ 00097000
*             WHILE TXTBYTE¬=WRKKEY;                       /*@Z30OE78*/ 00098000
         LA    MTXTPTR,MSGBUFF                                     0098 00099000
         ALR   MTXTPTR,TXTNDEX                                     0098 00100000
         B     @DE00098                                            0098 00101000
@DL00098 CLC   TXTBYTE(1,MTXTPTR),WRKKEY                           0098 00102000
         BE    @DC00098                                            0098 00103000
*         END;                                             /*@Z30OE78*/ 00104000
         AH    MTXTPTR,@CH00041                                    0099 00105000
@DE00098 LA    @11,MSGBUFF                                         0099 00106000
         ALR   @11,TXTNDEX                                         0099 00107000
         AH    @11,MLEN(,MSGLNPTR)                                 0099 00108000
         SH    @11,@CH00143                                        0099 00109000
         CR    MTXTPTR,@11                                         0099 00110000
         BNH   @DL00098                                            0099 00111000
@DC00098 DS    0H                                                  0100 00112000
*         IF TXTBYTE=WRKKEY THEN    /* IF KEY FOUND,         @Z30OE78*/ 00113000
         CLC   TXTBYTE(1,MTXTPTR),WRKKEY                           0100 00114000
         BNE   @RF00100                                            0100 00115000
*                                   /* PROCESS IT, ELSE      @Z30OE78*/ 00116000
*                                   /* IGNORE TEXT           @Z30OE78*/ 00117000
*         IF LOPFLAG = OFF THEN    /* IF LOPFLAG IS OFF,     @Y30OE62*/ 00118000
         TM    LOPFLAG,B'10000000'                                 0101 00119000
         BNZ   @RF00101                                            0101 00120000
*           MSGTEXT(1:NTRYLN-2) = TEXT(1:NTRYLN-2);        /*@Y30OE62*/ 00121000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0102 00122000
         IC    @11,NTRYLN(,TXTNPTR)                                0102 00123000
         SH    @11,@CH00045                                        0102 00124000
         EX    @11,@SM00689                                        0102 00125000
*                                  /* MOVE TEXT TO MSG       @Y30OE62*/ 00126000
*         ELSE                     /* IF LOPFLAG IS ON,      @Y30OE62*/ 00127000
*           DO;                                            /*@Y30OE62*/ 00128000
         B     @RC00101                                            0103 00129000
@RF00101 DS    0H                                                  0104 00130000
*             DO WHILE (TXTBYTE¬=COMMA);                   /*@Y30OE62*/ 00131000
         B     @DE00104                                            0104 00132000
@DL00104 DS    0H                                                  0105 00133000
*                                  /* LOOP TIL FIND COMMA    @Y30OE62*/ 00134000
*               MTXTPTR = MTXTPTR-1;                       /*@Y30OE62*/ 00135000
         BCTR  MTXTPTR,0                                           0105 00136000
*                                  /* MOVE BACK ONE BYTE     @Y30OE62*/ 00137000
*             END;                                         /*@Y30OE62*/ 00138000
@DE00104 CLI   TXTBYTE(MTXTPTR),C','                               0106 00139000
         BNE   @DL00104                                            0106 00140000
*             MSGLEN = MTXTPTR-ADDR(MSGBUFF)-MLNDEX;       /*@Y30OE62*/ 00141000
         LA    @11,MSGBUFF                                         0107 00142000
         LCR   @11,@11                                             0107 00143000
         ALR   @11,MTXTPTR                                         0107 00144000
         SLR   @11,MLNDEX                                          0107 00145000
         STH   @11,MSGLEN(,BFMLPTR)                                0107 00146000
*                                  /* ADJUST MSG LENGTH      @Y30OE62*/ 00147000
*             MSGBUFF(MSGLEN+1+MLNDEX:MLEN+MLNDEX)=BLANKS; /*@Y30OE62*/ 00148000
         AH    @11,@CH00041                                        0108 00149000
         ALR   @11,MLNDEX                                          0108 00150000
         LA    @15,MSGBUFF-1(@11)                                  0108 00151000
         LR    @14,MLNDEX                                          0108 00152000
         AH    @14,MLEN(,MSGLNPTR)                                 0108 00153000
         SLR   @14,@11                                             0108 00154000
         EX    @14,@SM00691                                        0108 00155000
*                                  /* BLANK REST OF MSG,     @Y30OE62*/ 00156000
*                                  /* STARTING WITH COMMA    @Y30OE62*/ 00157000
*           END;                                           /*@Y30OE62*/ 00158000
*         END;                                             /*@Y30OE62*/ 00159000
@RC00101 DS    0H                                                  0110 00160000
@RF00100 DS    0H                                                  0111 00161000
*     TXTNPTR = TXTNPTR+NTRYLN;    /* POINT TO NEXT ENTRY    @Y30OE62*/ 00162000
@RF00091 MVC   @ZT00003+3(1),NTRYLN(TXTNPTR)                       0111 00163000
         AL    TXTNPTR,@ZT00003                                    0111 00164000
*   END;                                                   /*@Y30OE62*/ 00165000
@DE00089 CLI   KEYCHK(TXTNPTR),X'7F'                               0112 00166000
         BNE   @DL00089                                            0112 00167000
*   IF MCODE¬=WRITECHK THEN        /* IF WTO OR WTOR, MOVE   @Y30OE62*/ 00168000
         CLI   MCODE(PARMLPTR),3                                   0113 00169000
         BE    @RF00113                                            0113 00170000
*     DO;                          /* ROUT & DESC CODES      @Y30OE62*/ 00171000

         LR    RDPTR,MSGLNPTR                                      0115 00173000
         AH    RDPTR,MLEN(,MSGLNPTR)                               0115 00174000
*                                  /* DESC CODES             @Y30OE62*/ 00175000
*       BFRDPTR = BFMLPTR+MSGLEN;  /* ROUT & DESC CODES      @Y30OE62*/ 00176000
         LR    BFRDPTR,BFMLPTR                                     0116 00177000
         AH    BFRDPTR,MSGLEN(,BFMLPTR)                            0116 00178000
*                                  /* FIELD IN BUFFER        @Y30OE62*/ 00179000
*       BFRTDSC = ROUTDESC;        /* MOVE TO BUFFER         @Y30OE62*/ 00180000
         MVC   BFRTDSC(4,BFRDPTR),ROUTDESC(RDPTR)                  0117 00181000
*     END;                                                 /*@Y30OE62*/ 00182000
*   R1 = ADDR(MSGBUFF);            /* POINT TO BUFFER        @Y30OE62*/ 00183000
@RF00113 LA    R1,MSGBUFF                                          0119 00184000
*   IF MCODE = WTOR THEN           /* IF WTOR,               @Y30OE62*/ 00185000
         CLI   MCODE(PARMLPTR),2                                   0120 00186000
         BNE   @RF00120                                            0120 00187000
*     DO;                                                  /*@Y30OE62*/ 00188000
*       REPLYPTR = ADDR(RPLYAREA);                         /*@Y30OE62*/ 00189000
         LA    @00,RPLYAREA                                        0122 00190000
         ST    @00,REPLYPTR(,PARMLPTR)                             0122 00191000
*                                  /* POINT TO REPLY AREA    @Y30OE62*/ 00192000
*       RPLYAREA = ''B;            /* BLANK REPLY AREA       @Y30OE62*/ 00193000
         XC    RPLYAREA(13),RPLYAREA                               0123 00194000
*                                  /* WITH BINARY ZEROES     @Y30OE62*/ 00195000
*       WAITECB = 0;               /* ZERO OUT ECB           @Y30OE62*/ 00196000
         SLR   @00,@00                                             0124 00197000
         ST    @00,WAITECB                                         0124 00198000
*       GENERATE REFS(WAITECB);                            /*@Y30OE62*/ 00199000
         WTOR MF=(E,(1))          /* ISSUE WTOR             @Y30OE62*/  00200000
         WAIT ECB=WAITECB         /* & WAIT                 @Y30OE62*/  00201000
*     END;                                                 /*@Y30OE62*/ 00202000
*   ELSE                                                           0127 00203000
*     IF MCODE = WRITECHK THEN     /* IF WRITE-CHECK,        @Y30OE62*/ 00204000
         B     @RC00120                                            0127 00205000
@RF00120 CLI   MCODE(PARMLPTR),3                                   0127 00206000
         BNE   @RF00127                                            0127 00207000
*       DO;                                                /*@Y30OE62*/ 00208000
*         DECBREG = DECBPTR;       /* GET DECB PTR           @Y30OE62*/ 00209000
         L     DECBREG,DECBPTR(,PARMLPTR)                          0129 00210000
*         DECBAREA = MSGBUFF;      /* MOVE BUFFER TO AREA    @Y30OE62*/ 00211000
         L     @15,DECBARPT(,DECBREG)                              0130 00212000
         MVC   DECBAREA(88,@15),MSGBUFF                            0130 00213000
*                                  /* POINTED TO BY DECB     @Y30OE62*/ 00214000
*         GENERATE REFS(DECBREG);                          /*@Y30OE62*/ 00215000
         WRITE (DECBREG),SF,MF=E  /* WRITE THE BUFFER       @Y30OE62*/  00216000
         CHECK (DECBREG)          /* CHECK IT               @Y30OE62*/  00217000
*       END;                                               /*@Y30OE62*/ 00218000
*     ELSE                         /* IT'S A WTO             @Y30OE62*/ 00219000
*       GEN (WTO MF=(E,(1)));      /* ISSUE WTO              @Y30OE62*/ 00220000
         B     @RC00127                                            0133 00221000
@RF00127 DS    0H                                                  0133 00222000
         WTO MF=(E,(1))                                                 00223000
*   R1 = PARMLPTR;                 /* POINT TO PARMLIST      @Y30OE62*/ 00224000
@RC00127 DS    0H                                                  0134 00225000
@RC00120 LR    R1,PARMLPTR                                         0134 00226000
*   END IOEDKMSG;                                          /*@Y30OE62*/ 00227000

@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0135 00229000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0135 00230000
         BR    @14                                                 0135 00231000

./  ADD  SSI=52830182,NAME=IOEDKOPN

IOEDKOPN CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000

         DC    C'IOEDKOPN  75.283'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  ST    @14,12(,@13)                                        0001 00010000

*   /*                                                               */ 00026000
*   /* BUILD AND INITIALIZE THE A.M. WORKAREA                @Y30OE95*/ 00027000

*                                                                  0103 00030000

         L     @10,MREPLYAD(,AMWKAPTR)                             0252 00575000
         CLI   REPLY(@10),C'R'                                     0252 00576000
         BNE   @RF00252                                            0252 00577000
*                         NOTCRFLG=OFF;/* SET REPLY ¬= C OR R      0253 00578000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC   00579000
*                                      FLAG                  @Y30OEAC*/ 00580000
         NI    NOTCRFLG(AMWKAPTR),B'11011111'                      0253 00581000
*                       ELSE        /* REPLY NOT R           @Y30OEAC*/ 00582000
*                         IF REPLY=CANCEL/* REPLY = C ?      @Y30OEAC*/ 00583000
*                           THEN    /* OPEN FAILS            @Y30OEAC*/ 00584000
         B     @RC00252                                            0254 00585000
@RF00252 L     @10,MREPLYAD(,AMWKAPTR)                             0254 00586000
         CLI   REPLY(@10),C'C'                                     0254 00587000
         BNE   @RF00254                                            0254 00588000
*DO10:                              /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00589000
*                           DO;     /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00590000
DO10     DS    0H                                                  0256 00591000
*                             RFLAG=OFF;/* SET REPLY=R FLAG  @Y30OEAC*/ 00592000
*                             NOTCRFLG=OFF;/* SET REPLY ¬= C @Y30OEAC   00593000
*                                      OR R FLAG             @Y30OEAC*/ 00594000
         NI    RFLAG(AMWKAPTR),B'10011111'                         0257 00595000
*                             CALL UCBUPDTE;/* MAKE UCB READY      0258 00596000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00597000
         BAL   @14,UCBUPDTE                                        0258 00598000
*                             RTNCDE=RC4;/* SET RETURN CODE  @ZA04248*/ 00599000
         MVC   RTNCDE(4,AMWKAPTR),@CF00054                         0259 00600000
*                           END;    /* END OF DO10           @Y30OEAC*/ 00601000
*                     END;          /* END OF DO9            @Y30OEAC*/ 00602000
@RF00254 DS    0H                                                  0261 00603000
@RC00252 DS    0H                                                  0261 00604000
@DE00234 TM    NOTCRFLG(AMWKAPTR),B'00100000'                      0261 00605000
         BO    @DL00234                                            0261 00606000
*                   END;            /* END OF DO8            @Y30OEAC*/ 00607000
*                 ELSE              /* UCBVLSER=JFCBVOLS     @Y30OEAC*/ 00608000
*DO11:                              /* ISSUE DATA SET OPEN   @Y30OE95*/ 00609000
*                   DO;             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00610000
         B     @RC00229                                            0263 00611000
@RF00229 DS    0H                                                  0263 00612000

*                     RFLAG=OFF;    /* SET REPLY=R FLAG      @Y30OEAC*/ 00614000
         NI    RFLAG(AMWKAPTR),B'10111111'                         0264 00615000
*                     SETDOPCD=OPEN;/* OPEN DATA SET OPCODE  @Y30OE95*/ 00616000
         MVI   SETDOPCD(AMWKAPTR),X'01'                            0265 00617000

*                     SETDDSID=JFCBDSNM;/* GET THE DATASET ID      0267 00620000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00621000
         MVC   SETDDSID(8,AMWKAPTR),JFCBDSNM+388(AMWKAPTR)         0267 00622000
*                     RWRK1=ADDR(SETDLIST);/* ADDRESS OF LIST      0268 00623000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00624000
         LA    RWRK1,SETDLIST(,AMWKAPTR)                           0268 00625000
*                     CALL IOESDKTI;/* GO OPEN DATA SET      @Y30OE95*/ 00626000
*                                                                  0269 00627000
         L     @15,@CV02711                                        0269 00628000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0269 00629000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00630000
*                     /*                                             */ 00631000
*                     /* PROCESS PASSBACK FROM DATA SET OPEN @Y30OEAC*/ 00632000
*                     /*                                             */ 00633000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00634000
*                                                                  0270 00635000
*                     IF ERTNCDE¬=XZERO/* UNSUCCESSFUL OPEN ?      0270 00636000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00637000
*                       THEN        /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00638000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(AMWKAPTR),0                                 0270 00639000
         BE    @RF00270                                            0270 00640000
*                       DO;         /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00641000
*                         RTNCDE=RC8;/* SET R.C. =8          @ZA04248*/ 00642000

*                         RFLAG=OFF;/* SET REPLY=R FLAG      @ZA04454*/ 00644000
         NI    RFLAG(AMWKAPTR),B'10111111'                         0273 00645000
*                       END;        /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00646000
*                     ELSE          /* PAIR WITH IF          @Y30OE95*/ 00647000
*                       IF ACBLRECL¬=JCLBLKLN/* IS REC LEN 80      0275 00648000

*                         DO;       /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00654000
*                           RTNCDE=RC4;/* SET RETURN CODE = 4      0277 00655000
*                                                            @ZA04248*/ 00656000

*                           RFLAG=OFF;/* SET REPLY=R FLAG    @ZA04454*/ 00658000

*                         END;      /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00660000
*                   END;            /* END OF DO11           @Y30OEAC*/ 00661000
@RF00275 DS    0H                                                  0280 00662000
@RC00270 DS    0H                                                  0281 00663000
*               END;                /* END OF DO7            @Y30OEAC*/ 00664000
@RC00229 DS    0H                                                  0282 00665000
*           END;                    /* END OF DO5            @Y30OEAC*/ 00666000
@RC00223 DS    0H                                                  0283 00667000
*         RFY                       /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00668000
*           RWRK1 UNRSTD;           /* RELEASE REGISTER      @Y30OEAC*/ 00669000
@RC00216 DS    0H                                                  0284 00670000
*       END;                        /* END OF D03            @ZA04454*/ 00671000
@DE00209 TM    RFLAG(AMWKAPTR),B'01000000'                         0284 00672000
         BO    @DL00209                                            0284 00673000
*     END;                          /* END OF D01A           @ZA04454*/ 00674000
*                                                                  0285 00675000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00676000
*   /*                                                               */ 00677000
*   /* PROCESS RETURN CODES                                  @Y30OE95*/ 00678000
*   /*                                                               */ 00679000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00680000
*                                                                  0286 00681000
*   RFY                             /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00682000
*    (RWRK4,                        /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00683000
*     RWRK1) RSTD;                  /* RESTRICT REGISTER     @ZA04454*/ 00684000
@RF00177 DS    0H                                                  0287 00685000
*   RWRK4=RTNCDE;                   /* SAVE RETURN CODE, IF  @ZA04454   00686000
*                                      CLOSE CALLED THE AM-  @ZA04454   00687000
*                                      WORK AREA IS CLEARED  @ZA04454*/ 00688000
         L     @10,RTNCDE(,AMWKAPTR)                               0287 00689000
         LR    RWRK4,@10                                           0287 00690000
*   IF RTNCDE=RC4|                  /* IF RETURN CODE        @ZA04248*/ 00691000
*       RTNCDE=RC8&                 /* IS BAD                @ZA04458*/ 00692000
*       TIOEDDNM=JCL                /* IS BAD OPEN FOR JCL   @ZA04458*/ 00693000
*     THEN                          /* YES                   @Y30OE95*/ 00694000
         CH    @10,@CH00054                                        0288 00695000
         BE    @RT00288                                            0288 00696000
         CH    @10,@CH00056                                        0288 00697000

         CLC   TIOEDDNM-24(8,@10),@CC02766                         0288 00701000
         BNE   @RF00288                                            0288 00702000
@RT00288 DS    0H                                                  0289 00703000
*     DO;                           /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00704000
*       RWRK1=DCBPTR;               /* RESTORE DCB ADDR      @ZA04454*/ 00705000
         LR    RWRK1,DCBPTR                                        0290 00706000
*       CALL IOEDKCLS;              /* CALL CLOSE MODULE     @ZA04248*/ 00707000

         BALR  @14,@15                                             0291 00709000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00710000
*   RFY                             /*                       @ZA04454*/ 00711000
*     RWRK1 UNRSTD;                 /* RELEASE REGISTER      @ZA04454*/ 00712000
@RF00288 DS    0H                                                  0294 00713000
*   RETURN CODE(RWRK4);             /* RETURN WITH RETURN CD @ZA04454*/ 00714000
         LR    @15,RWRK4                                           0294 00715000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0294 00716000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0294 00717000
@ER00001 L     @14,12(,@13)                                        0294 00718000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0294 00719000
         BR    @14                                                 0294 00720000
*UCBUPDTE:                          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00721000
*   PROC OPTIONS(SAVE(14));         /*                       @Z30OEAD*/ 00722000
UCBUPDTE ST    @14,@SA00002                                        0295 00723000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OEAC*/ 00724000
*/*                                                          @Y30OEAC*/ 00725000
*/* THIS SUBROUTINE UPDATES THE UCB                          @Y30OEAC*/ 00726000
*/*                                                          @Y30OEAC*/ 00727000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OEAC*/ 00728000
*                                                                  0296 00729000
*   GEN(MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP); /* CHANGE KEY TO ZERO    @Z30OEAD*/ 00730000
         MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP                                      00731000
*   RLOCK=ADDR(UCBLOCK);            /* PNT TO UCB LOCK       @Z30OEAD*/ 00732000
         LR    RLOCK,UCBPTR                                        0297 00733000
         AL    RLOCK,@CF02848                                      0297 00734000
*   GEN;                                                           0298 00735000
*                                  /* GET SETLOCK MACRO     @Z30OEAD*/  00736000
       SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=IOSUCB,ADDR=(11),                          XX00737000
               MODE=UNCOND,REGS=USE,                                  XX00738000
               RELATED=(UCB,(IOEDKOPN,UCB))                 @Z30OEAD    00739000
*   IF AMXFLAG=ON                   /* 3540 A.M. BIT UPDATE? @Y30OEAC*/ 00740000
*     THEN                          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00741000
         TM    AMXFLAG(AMWKAPTR),B'00000001'                       0299 00742000
         BNO   @RF00299                                            0299 00743000
*     UCBDKAMX=ON;                  /* SET BIT IN UCB        @Y30OEAC*/ 00744000
         L     @10,UCBXTADR(,UCBPTR)                               0300 00745000
         OI    UCBDKAMX(@10),B'10000000'                           0300 00746000
*   ELSE                            /* VLSER|READY BIT UPDTE @Y30OEAC*/ 00747000
*     IF VOLUPDTE=ON                /* VOL-SER UPDATE ?      @Y30OEAC*/ 00748000
*       THEN                        /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00749000
         B     @RC00299                                            0301 00750000
@RF00299 TM    VOLUPDTE(AMWKAPTR),B'00000010'                      0301 00751000
         BNO   @RF00301                                            0301 00752000
*       UCBVLSER=VOLSERID;          /* UPDATE UCB VOL-SER    @Y30OEAC*/ 00753000
         L     @10,UCBXTADR(,UCBPTR)                               0302 00754000
         MVC   UCBVLSER(6,@10),VOLSERID(AMWKAPTR)                  0302 00755000
*     ELSE                          /* NOT READY BIT UPDATE  @Y30OEAC*/ 00756000
*       IF NOTREADY=ON              /* ¬READY BIT IND ON ?   @Y30OEAC*/ 00757000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00758000
         B     @RC00301                                            0303 00759000
@RF00301 TM    NOTREADY(AMWKAPTR),B'00000100'                      0303 00760000

*         UCBNOTRD=ON;              /* MAKE UCB NOT READY    @Y30OEAC*/ 00762000
         OI    UCBNOTRD(UCBPTR),B'01000000'                        0304 00763000
*       ELSE                        /* ¬READY BIT IND OFF    @Y30OEAC*/ 00764000
*         UCBNOTRD=OFF;             /* MAKE UCB READY        @Y30OEAC*/ 00765000

*   VOLUPDTE=OFF;                   /* SET VOL-SER UPDTE IND @Y30OEAC*/ 00768000

@RC00299 DS    0H                                                  0307 00771000
*   NOTREADY=OFF;                   /* SET ¬READY BIT IND    @Y30OEAC*/ 00772000
*   AMXFLAG=OFF;                    /* SET 3540 A.M. IND     @Y30OEAC*/ 00773000
         NI    VOLUPDTE(AMWKAPTR),B'11111000'                      0308 00774000
*   GEN;                                                           0309 00775000
*                                  /* GET SETLOCK MACRO     @Z30OEAD*/  00776000
       SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=IOSUCB,ADDR=(11),REGS=USE,                XX00777000
               RELATED=(UCB,(IOEDKOPN,UCB))                 @Z30OEAD    00778000
*   GEN(MODESET KEY=NZERO,MODE=PROB);/* RESTORE KEY          @Z30OEAD*/ 00779000
         MODESET KEY=NZERO,MODE=PROB                                    00780000
*   END UCBUPDTE;                   /*                       #Y30OEAC*/ 00781000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0311 00782000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0311 00783000
@ER00002 L     @14,@SA00002                                        0311 00784000

*PUTIO:                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00295000

@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0150 00297000

         BR    @14                                                 0150 00300000
PUTIO    DS    0H                                                  0151 00301000
*   RFY                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00302000
*     REG14 RSTD;                   /* RESTRICT REGISTER     @Y30OEAC*/ 00303000
*   ECB=ZERO;                       /* CLEAR THE ECB         @Y30OEAC*/ 00304000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0152 00305000

         LA    @09,0(,@09)                                         0152 00307000
         L     @07,IOBECBPB-1(,@09)                                0152 00308000
         ST    @15,ECB(,@07)                                       0152 00309000
*   IF CCWPTR¬=IOBSTRTB+CHPGMLN     /* BUFFER NOT FULL ?     @Y30OEAC*/ 00310000
*     THEN                          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00311000
         L     @07,CCWPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                             0153 00312000
         LA    @07,0(,@07)                                         0153 00313000
         LA    @02,224                                             0153 00314000

         ALR   @10,@02                                             0153 00318000
         CR    @07,@10                                             0153 00319000
         BE    @RF00153                                            0153 00320000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00321000
*                                                                  0154 00322000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00323000
*       /*                                                           */ 00324000
*       /* PREPARE THE CCW CHAIN                             @Y30OEAC*/ 00325000
*       /*                                                           */ 00326000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00327000
*                                                                  0155 00328000
*       JAMCCW=JAMCCW&&NOOPCCW;     /* PLACE LAST NOOP AT    @Y30OEAC*/ 00329000
         L     @09,IOBSTART(,@09)                                  0155 00330000
         ALR   @02,@09                                             0155 00331000
         XC    JAMCCW(8,@07),NOOPCCW(@02)                          0155 00332000
*       NOOPCCW=NOOPCCW&&JAMCCW;    /* CURRENT END OF        @Y30OEAC*/ 00333000
         XC    NOOPCCW(8,@02),JAMCCW(@07)                          0156 00334000
*       JAMCCW=JAMCCW&&NOOPCCW;     /* CHAIN                 @Y30OEAC*/ 00335000
*                                                                  0157 00336000
         XC    JAMCCW(8,@07),NOOPCCW(@02)                          0157 00337000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00338000
*       /*                                                           */ 00339000
*       /* BUILD DEFINE OPS CCW AT BEGINNING OF CHAIN        @Y30OEAC*/ 00340000
*       /*                                                           */ 00341000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00342000
*                                                                  0158 00343000
*       CCWCNT=(CCWPTR-IOBSTRTB)/LENGTH(JAMCCW)-/* POINT TO  @Y30OEAC*/ 00344000
*           OFFSET2;                /* FIRST CCW             @Y30OEAC*/ 00345000
         LR    @00,@07                                             0158 00346000

         BCTR  @01,0                                               0158 00351000
         STC   @01,CCWCNT(,AMWKAPTR)                               0158 00352000
*       ALLOWOPS=WRTCMD;            /* SET WRITE OPERATION   @Y30OEAC*/ 00353000
         MVI   ALLOWOPS(AMWKAPTR),X'40'                            0159 00354000
*       RLENGTH=ZERO;               /* CLEAR RECORD LENGTH   @Y30OEAC*/ 00355000

*       RFY                         /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00357000
*         JAMCCW BASED(IOBSTART);   /* SET CCW POINTER       @Y30OEAC*/ 00358000
*       CCWCMDCD=DFNCMDCD;          /* DEFINE OPS COMMAND    @Y30OEAC   00359000
*                                      CODE                  @Y30OEAC*/ 00360000
         MVI   CCWCMDCD(@09),X'2F'                                 0162 00361000
*       CCWDATAD=ADDR(DFNOPS);      /* SET CCW DATA ADDR     @Y30OEAC*/ 00362000
         LA    @15,DFNOPS(,AMWKAPTR)                               0163 00363000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWDATAD(@09)                                 0163 00364000
*       CCWCOUNT=WRITECNT;          /* SET CCW COUNT         @Y30OEAC*/ 00365000
         MVC   CCWCOUNT(2,@09),@CH00052                            0164 00366000
*       RFY                         /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00367000
*         JAMCCW BASED(CCWPTR);     /* RESTORE CCW PTR       @Y30OEAC*/ 00368000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00369000
*                                                                  0166 00370000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00371000
*   /*                                                               */ 00372000
*   /* EXCP CURRENT BUFFER                                   @Y30OEAC*/ 00373000
*   /*                                                               */ 00374000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00375000
*                                                                  0167 00376000
*   RFY                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00377000
*    (RWRK1,                        /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00378000
*     RWRK2) RSTD;                  /* RESTRICT REGISTERS    @Y30OEAC*/ 00379000
@RF00153 DS    0H                                                  0168 00380000
*   RWRK1=IOBPTR;                   /* POINTER TO CURRENT    @Y30OEAC   00381000
*                                      IOB                   @Y30OEAC*/ 00382000
         L     RWRK1,IOBPTR-1(,AMWKAPTR)                           0168 00383000
         LA    RWRK1,0(,RWRK1)                                     0168 00384000
*   GEN(EXCP (RWRK1));              /* ISSUE EXCP            @Y30OEAC*/ 00385000
         EXCP (RWRK1)                                                   00386000
*   IF PARM=SWITCH                  /* SWITCH MODE ?         @Y30OEAC*/ 00387000
*     THEN                          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00388000
