*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02173000
*/*      END OF DISKETTE PROCESSING CODE                     @Y30OE73*/ 02174000
*/*      -ENTERED WHEN PUT ENCOUNTERS AN END OF DISKETTE     @Y30OE73*/ 02175000
*/*       CONDITION .                                        @Y30OE73*/ 02176000
*/*      - THE ACCESS METHOD HAS PLACED A CODE OF X'0800' IN @Y30OE73*/ 02177000
*/*        RPLFDBK1 AND RPLFDBK2 FIELDS                      @Y30OE73*/ 02178000
*/*      - THE ACBVSSER FIELD CONTAINS THE VOL SER FOR THE   @Y30OE73*/ 02179000
*/*        DISKETTE JUST WRITTEN .                           @Y30OE73*/ 02180000
*/*      -A VOLSER IS ADDED TO THE MSG WRITER LIST AND WHEN  @Y30OE73*/ 02181000

*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02183000

*/*         -MSG WRITER PARAMETER LIST UPDATED WITH A VOLSER @Y30OE73*/ 02188000
*/*         -MSG IEB571I ISSUED AT END OF INPUT DATA OR WHEN @Y30OE73*/ 02189000
*/*          ALL POSITIONS FOR VOLSERS ARE FULL              @Y30OE73*/ 02190000
*/*         -RETURN CODES SET TO INDICATE GOOD PUT           @Y30OE73*/ 02191000

@ER00005 BR    @14                                                 0696 02350000
*                                                                  0697 02351000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02352000
*/*  ******************************************************* @Y30OE73*/ 02353000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02354000
*/*      OUTPUT SYNAD ROUTINE:                               @Y30OE73*/ 02355000
*/*      THIS RTN RECIEVES CONTROL FROM THE 3540 PUT MODULE  @Y30OE73*/ 02356000
*/*      IOEDKPUT WHEN:                                      @Y30OE73*/ 02357000
*/*      -  A DELIMINATOR DISKETTE IS ENCOUNTERED            @Y30OE73*/ 02358000
*/*      - A PERMANENT I/O ERROR OCCURES ON THE 3540 DEVICE  @Y30OE73*/ 02359000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02360000
*/*      FOR DELIMINATOR DISKETTES FLAGS ARE SET TO CAUSE    @Y30OE73*/ 02361000
*/*      THE DISKETTE WRITER TO STOP PROCESSING SND A        @Y30OE73*/ 02362000
*/*      RETURN CODE FOR THE WRITER IS SET                   @Y30OE73*/ 02363000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02364000
*/*      FOR PERMANENT I/O ERRORS RECOVERY IS ATTEMPTED FOR  @Y30OE73*/ 02365000
*/*      THE FIRST OCCURANCE OF AND ERROR ON A DATA SET AND  @Y30OE73*/ 02366000
*/*      WHEN THE RECORD COUNTERS ARE VALID                  @Y30OE73*/ 02367000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02368000
*/*  ******************************************************* @Y30OE73*/ 02369000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02370000
*                                                                  0697 02371000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0697 02372000
*     RTNREG RSTD;                  /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02373000
*OUTERRRT:                          /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02374000
*   PROC                            /* SYNAD ROUTINE OUTPUT  @Y30OE73*/ 02375000
*       OPTIONS(SAVEAREA,NOSAVE);   /* OPTIONS TO SAVE       @Y30OE73   02376000
*                                      REG14 AND PROVIDE     @Y30OE73   02377000
*                                      SAVEAREA              @Y30OE73*/ 02378000

*   RESPECIFY                                                      0700 02386000
*     RTNREG UNRSTD;                /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02387000

*     END;                          /* END PROC DLM DSKT     @Y30OE73*/ 02414000

*                 VOLKEY(INDX)=KSKIP;/* SET TO IGNORE VOLS   @Y30OE73*/ 02713000
         LR    @10,@14                                             0773 02714000
         SLA   @10,3                                               0773 02715000
         SLR   @04,@04                                             0773 02716000
         STC   @04,VOLKEY-8(@10)                                   0773 02717000
*               END;                /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02718000
         AL    @14,@CF00070                                        0774 02719000
@DE00772 STH   @14,INDX                                            0774 02720000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0774 02721000
         ICM   @10,3,MAXVOLS                                       0774 02722000
         CR    @14,@10                                             0774 02723000
         BNH   @DL00772                                            0774 02724000
*             END;                  /* END MSG IEB571I       @Y30OE73   02725000
*                                      ISSUE MSG IEB572I     @Y30OE73*/ 02726000
*           MSGID=MSG572E;          /* SET CODE FOR MSG TO   @Y30OE73   02727000
*                                      BE ISSUED             @Y30OE73*/ 02728000
@RF00754 MVI   MSGID,X'15'                                         0776 02729000
*           DEVAKEY=KDEVA;          /* SET KEY TO INCLUDE    @Y30OE73   02730000
*                                      DEVICE ADDR IN MSG    @Y30OE73*/ 02731000
         MVI   DEVAKEY,X'08'                                       0777 02732000
*           DEVA=UCBNAME;           /* SET UNIT ADDR FOR MSG @Y30OE73*/ 02733000
         L     @14,UCBPTR                                          0778 02734000
         MVC   DEVA(3),UCBNAME(@14)                                0778 02735000
*           REG1=ADDR(MSGWTLST);    /* SET LIST PTR FOR MSG  @Y30OE73   02736000
*                                      WRITER                @Y30OE73*/ 02737000
         LA    REG1,MSGWTLST                                       0779 02738000
*           CALL IOEDKMSG;          /* WRITE MSG IEB572E     @Y30OE73*/ 02739000
         L     @15,@CV03341                                        0780 02740000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0780 02741000
*           RDWRTFLG=OFF;           /* STOP WRITING CURRENT  @Y30OE73   02742000
*                                      DATA SET              @Y30OE73*/ 02743000
*           WRTDSFLG=OFF;           /* STOP WRITING DATA SETS      0782 02744000
*                                                            @Y30OE73*/ 02745000
         NI    RDWRTFLG,B'11001111'                                0782 02746000
*         END;                      /* NO RECOVERY CLEANUP   @Y30OE73*/ 02747000
*     END;                          /* END PROCESS PIOE      @Y30OE73*/ 02748000
@RF00752 DS    0H                                                  0785 02749000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0785 02750000
*     RTNREG RSTD;                  /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02751000
@RF00713 DS    0H                                                  0786 02752000
*   RTNREG=SRTNOSYD;                /* RESTORE RETURN ADDR   @Y30OE73   02753000
*                                      TO RETURN TO 3540 AM  @Y30OE73   02754000
*                                      AFTER RECOVERY FROM   @Y30OE73   02755000
*                                      AN OUTPUT ERROR       @Y30OE73*/ 02756000
         LR    RTNREG,SRTNOSYD                                     0786 02757000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0787 02758000
*     RTNREG UNRSTD;                /*                       @Y30OE73*/ 02759000
*   END OUTERRRT;                   /* END 3540 SYNAD RTN    @Y30OE73*/ 02760000
@EL00006 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0788 02761000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  0788 02762000
@ER00006 BR    @14                                                 0788 02763000
*                                   /* ROUTINE               @Y30OE73*/ 02764000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02765000
*/*  ******************************************************  #Y30OE73*/ 02766000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02767000
*/*      THIS ROUTINE IS USED WHEN PROCESSING IN ONE DS MODE #Y30OE73*/ 02768000
*/*      OR IN MULTI DS MODE TO CLOSE AND UNALLOCATE A       #Y30OE73*/ 02769000
*/*      SUBSYSTEM DATA SET  AND PROCESS SOME OF THE ERROR   #Y30OE73*/ 02770000
*/*      CLEAN UP WORK FOR ALLOC ERRORS                      #Y30OE73*/ 02771000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02772000
*/*      INPUT:                                              #Y30OE73*/ 02773000
*/*      -- INPUT DCB                                        #Y30OE73*/ 02774000
*/*      -- ALLOCATION TEXT UNITS AND S99RB                  #Y30OE73*/ 02775000
*/*      -- WTRCODE                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02776000
*/*      OUTPUT:                                             #Y30OE73*/ 02777000
*/*      -- CLOSED DCB AVAILABLE FOR REUSE                   #Y30OE73*/ 02778000
*/*      -- DATA SET UNALLOCATED                             #Y30OE73*/ 02779000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02780000
*/*  ******************************************************  #Y30OE73*/ 02781000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 02782000
*                                                                  0789 02783000
*CLSUNALC:                                                         0789 02784000
*   PROC;                           /* INTERNAL PROCEDURE    #Y30OE73   02785000
*                                      USED TO CLOSE AND     #Y30OE73   02786000
*                                      UNALLOCATE DATA SETS  @Y30OE73*/ 02787000
CLSUNALC STM   @14,@12,@SA00007                                    0789 02788000
*   IF WTRCODE¬=DALLOCER&           /* IS DATA SET TO        @Y30OE73*/ 02789000
*       WTRCODE¬=SSDSOPNE THEN      /* BE CLOSED             @Z30OE73   02790000
*                                      YES CLOSE IT          @Y30OE73*/ 02791000
         CLI   WTRCODE,20                                          0790 02792000
         BE    @RF00790                                            0790 02793000
         CLI   WTRCODE,12                                          0790 02794000
         BE    @RF00790                                            0790 02795000
*     GEN(    CLOSE INPUTDCB);      /* CLOSE SUB SYS DTA SET @Y30OE73*/ 02796000
             CLOSE INPUTDCB                                             02797000
*   IF WTRCODE¬=DALLOCER THEN       /* WAS DTA SET ALLOCATED @Y30OE73*/ 02798000
@RF00790 CLI   WTRCODE,20                                          0792 02799000
         BE    @RF00792                                            0792 02800000
*     DO;                           /* YES DO UNALLOC        @Y30OE73*/ 02801000
*       S99VERB=S99VRBUN;           /* SET VERB IN S99RB TO  @Y30OE73   02802000
*                                      UNALLOCATE            @Y30OE73*/ 02803000
         MVI   S99VERB,X'02'                                       0794 02804000
*       S99FLAG1=S99FLAG1&&S99FLAG1;/* CLR FLAG BYT          @Y30OE73   02805000
*                                      BITS IN FLAG 1        @Y30OE73*/ 02806000
         XC    S99FLAG1(2),S99FLAG1                                0795 02807000
*       S99RSC=S99RSC&&S99RSC;      /* CLEAR RTN CODE FLD    @Y30OE73*/ 02808000
         XC    S99RSC(4),S99RSC                                    0796 02809000
*       S99TXTPP=ADDR(UTXTPTRS);    /* SET PTR TO TEXT       @Y30OE73   02810000
*                                      UNIT PTRS TO POINT TO @Y30OE73   02811000
*                                      THE UNALLOC TXT UNIT  @Y30OE73   02812000
*                                      TEXT POINTERS         @Y30OE73*/ 02813000
         LA    @14,UTXTPTRS                                        0797 02814000
         ST    @14,S99TXTPP                                        0797 02815000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02816000
*/*      SET UP UNALLOC TEXT UNITS                           @Y30OE73*/ 02817000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02818000
*                                                                  0798 02819000
*       UDDNAME=RDDNDDN;            /* SET UNALLOC DDN TO DDN      0798 02820000
*                                                            @Y30OE73   02821000
*                                      RETURNED FORM ALLOC   @Y30OE73*/ 02822000
         MVC   UDDNAME(8),RDDNDDN                                  0798 02823000
*       IF WTRCODE=NOERROR THEN     /* FOR DATA SETS         @Y30OE73   02824000
*                                      WRITTEN OK            @Y30OE73*/ 02825000
         CLI   WTRCODE,0                                           0799 02826000
         BNE   @RF00799                                            0799 02827000
*         DISPPARM=DISPDELT;        /* SET DISP FOR DATA SET @Y30OE73   02828000
*                                      TO DELETE             @Y30OE73*/ 02829000
         MVI   DISPPARM,X'04'                                      0800 02830000
*       ELSE                        /* ALL DATA NOT WRITTEN  @Y30OE73*/ 02831000
*         DISPPARM=DISPKEEP;        /* SET DISP TO KEEP      @Y30OE73*/ 02832000
         B     @RC00799                                            0801 02833000
@RF00799 MVI   DISPPARM,X'08'                                      0801 02834000
*       REG1=ADDR(S99RBPTR);        /* SET REG 1 TO POINT    @Y30OE73   02835000
*                                      TO S99RB PTR FOR      @Y30OE73   02836000
*                                      DYNAMIC UNALLOC       @Y30OE73*/ 02837000
@RC00799 LA    REG1,S99RBPTR                                       0802 02838000
*       GEN(   SVC   99   );        /* UNALLOC DATA SET      @Y30OE73*/ 02839000
            SVC   99                                                    02840000
*       IF RTNCDREG¬=NOERROR THEN   /* WAS DS UNALLOC        @Z30OE73   02841000
*                                      NOT SUCCESSFUL        @Y30OE73*/ 02842000
         LTR   RTNCDREG,RTNCDREG                                   0804 02843000
         BZ    @RF00804                                            0804 02844000
*         CALL PROS99RC;            /* PROCESS UNALLOC RTN   @Y30OE73   02845000
*                                      CODES FROM SVC 99     @Y30OE73*/ 02846000
         BAL   @14,PROS99RC                                        0805 02847000
*       IF WTRCODE=NODSID THEN      /* IF DATA SET DID       @Y30OE73   02848000
*                                      HAD NO DSID CONT      @Y30OE73   02849000
*                                      WITH NEXT DATA SET    @Y30OE73*/ 02850000
@RF00804 CLI   WTRCODE,44                                          0806 02851000
         BNE   @RF00806                                            0806 02852000
*         WTRCODE=NOERROR;          /* RESET WTRCODE         @Y30OE73*/ 02853000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'00'                                       0807 02854000
*       IF WTRCODE=SSDSOPNE THEN    /* WHEN NOT ABLE         @Z30OE73   02855000
*                                      TO OPEN SUB SYS DATA  @Z30OE73   02856000
*                                      DATA SET SET RTN CDE  @Z30OE73   02857000
*                                      SO CAN CONTINUE WITH  @Z30OE73   02858000
*                                      NEXT DATA SET         @Z30OE73*/ 02859000
@RF00806 CLI   WTRCODE,12                                          0808 02860000
         BNE   @RF00808                                            0808 02861000
*         WTRCODE=NOERROR;          /* SET RTN CODE TO NO    @Z30OE73   02862000
*                                      ERROR                 @Z30OE73*/ 02863000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'00'                                       0809 02864000
*     END;                          /* END UNALLOC DATA SET  #Y30OE73*/ 02865000
*   ELSE                            /* IT WAS AN ALLOC ERROR @Z30OE73*/ 02866000
*     IF ALLRETRY=ON THEN           /* IS RETRY TO BE ATTEM  @Z30OE73*/ 02867000
         B     @RC00792                                            0811 02868000
@RF00792 TM    ALLRETRY,B'00000100'                                0811 02869000
         BNO   @RF00811                                            0811 02870000
*       WTRCODE=NOERROR;            /* SET WTR CODE TO LOOK  @Z30OE73   02871000
*                                      LIKE NO ERROR OCCURED @Z30OE73*/ 02872000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'00'                                       0812 02873000
*   END CLSUNALC;                   /*                       #Y30OE73*/ 02874000
@EL00007 DS    0H                                                  0813 02875000
@EF00007 DS    0H                                                  0813 02876000
@ER00007 LM    @14,@12,@SA00007                                    0813 02877000
         BR    @14                                                 0813 02878000
*                                                                  0814 02879000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02880000
*/*      FUNCTION:                                           @Y30OE73*/ 02881000
*/*      TO PROCESS SUBSYSTEM REQUEST RETURN CODES AND       @Y30OE73*/ 02882000
*/*      DETERMINE IF THE ERROR IS ONE OF THE FOLLOWING      @Y30OE73*/ 02883000
*/*      --A NORMAL OCCURANCE                                @Y30OE73*/ 02884000
*/*      --A RECOVERABLE ERROR                               @Y30OE73*/ 02885000
*/*      --SEVERE ENOUGH TO TERMINATE THE WRITER             @Y30OE73*/ 02886000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02887000
*/*      INPUTS:                                             @Y30OE73*/ 02888000
*/*      --SSOBRETN(A 4 BYTE RETRUN CODE FIELD IN THE SSOB   @Y30OE73*/ 02889000
*/*         SSSOEODS  NO MORE DATA SETS TO SELECT            @Y30OE73*/ 02890000
*/*         SSSONJOB  JOB NOT FOUND                          @Y30OE73*/ 02891000
*/*         SSSOINVA  INVALID SEARCH ARGUMENTS               @Y30OE73*/ 02892000
*/*         SSSOUNAV  UNABLE TO PROCESS NOW                  @Y30OE73*/ 02893000
*/*         SSSODUPJ  DUPLICATE JOBNAMES                     @Y30OE73*/ 02894000
*/*         SSSOINVJ  INVALID JOBNAME/JOBID COMBINATION      @Y30OE73*/ 02895000
*/*         SSSOIDST  INVALID DESTINATION SPECIFIED          @Y30OE73*/ 02896000
*/*      --SAVESSRC                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02897000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02898000
*/*      OUTPUT:                                             @Y30OE73*/ 02899000
*/*      --WTRCODE                                           @Y30OE73*/ 02900000
*/*      --SAVESSRC                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02901000
*/*      --ERROR MESSAGES IEB577I AND IEB581E                @Y30OE73*/ 02902000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02903000
*/*  ******************************************************  @Y30OE73*/ 02904000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 02905000
*                                                                  0814 02906000
*PROCSSRC:                                                         0814 02907000
*   PROC;                           /* INTERNAL PROCEDURE    @Y30OE73   02908000
*                                      TO PROCESS SUBSYSTEM  @Y30OE73   02909000
*                                      REQUEST RETURN CODES  @Y30OE73*/ 02910000
PROCSSRC STM   @14,@12,@SA00008                                    0814 02911000
*   WTRCODE=SSRERROR;               /* SET WTRCODE FOR SUB   @Y30OE73   02912000
*                                      SYSTEM REQUESTT ERR   @Y30OE73*/ 02913000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'04'                                       0815 02914000
*   IF MULTIDSM=OFF THEN            /* IS WTR IN ONE DS MODE @Y30OE73   02915000
*                                      YES                   @Y30OE73*/ 02916000
         TM    MULTIDSM,B'10000000'                                0816 02917000
         BNZ   @RF00816                                            0816 02918000
*     IF SSOBRETN¬=SSSOEODS THEN    /* IS THE ERROR OTHER    @Y30OE73   02919000
*                                      THAN END OF DATA SETS @Y30OE73   02920000
*                                      YES                   @Y30OE73*/ 02921000
         L     @14,SSOBRETN                                        0817 02922000
         CH    @14,@CH00067                                        0817 02923000
         BE    @RF00817                                            0817 02924000
*       IF SSOBRETN¬=SSSOINVA THEN  /* IS IT OTHER           @Y30OE73   02925000
*                                      THAN INVALID SEARCH   @Y30OE73   02926000
*                                      ARGUMENTS             @Y30OE73*/ 02927000
         CH    @14,@CH00033                                        0818 02928000
         BE    @RF00818                                            0818 02929000
*         DO;                       /* YES                   @Y30OE73*/ 02930000
*           SAVESSRC=SSOBRETN;      /* SAVE SUBSYS REQ       @Y30OE73   02931000
*                                      RETURN CODE           @Y30OE73*/ 02932000
         ST    @14,SAVESSRC                                        0820 02933000
*           CALL SYSERMSG;          /* WRITE OUT MSG'S       @Y30OE73   02934000
*                                      IEB577I +IEB581E      @Y30OE73*/ 02935000
         BAL   @14,SYSERMSG                                        0821 02936000
*         END;                      /* END ERROR MSG         @Y30OE73*/ 02937000
*       ELSE                        /* ERROR WAS INVALID     #Y30OE73   02938000
*                                      SEARCH ARGUMENTS      #Y30OE73*/ 02939000
*         IF SAVESSRC=SSSOINVA THEN /* SECOND TIME           #Y30OE73   02940000
*                                      FOR ERROR YES         #Y30OE73*/ 02941000
         B     @RC00818                                            0823 02942000
@RF00818 CLC   SAVESSRC(4),@CF00033                                0823 02943000
         BNE   @RF00823                                            0823 02944000
*           CALL SYSERMSG;          /* WRITE MSG'S 577 +581  #Y30OE73*/ 02945000
         BAL   @14,SYSERMSG                                        0824 02946000
*         ELSE                      /* NOT 1ST TIME SO RETRY #Y30OE73*/ 02947000
*           DO;                     /* RESTORE SSSO          #Y30OE73*/ 02948000
         B     @RC00823                                            0825 02949000
@RF00823 DS    0H                                                  0826 02950000
*             SAVESSRC=SSOBRETN;    /* SAVE ERROR            #Y30OE73*/ 02951000
         MVC   SAVESSRC(4),SSOBRETN                                0826 02952000
*             SSSOUFLG=ZERO;        /* CLEAR USER OPTIONS    #Y30OE73   02953000
*                                      CLASS ROUTING FLAGS   @Y30OE73*/ 02954000
         MVI   SSSOUFLG,X'00'                                      0827 02955000
*             SSSOFLG1=ZERO;        /* CLEAR DS              @Y30OE73   02956000
*                                      SELECTION FLAGS       @Y30OE73*/ 02957000
         MVI   SSSOFLG1,X'00'                                      0828 02958000
*             IF SSIDCODE=JES2SS    /* IS SUBSYS JES2        @ZA04482*/ 02959000
*               THEN                /* YES                   @ZA04482*/ 02960000
         CLI   SSIDCODE,X'04'                                      0829 02961000
         BNE   @RF00829                                            0829 02962000
*               SSSOSHLD=ON;        /* SELECT HELD           @Y30OE73   02963000
*                                      DATA SETS             @Y30OE73*/ 02964000
         OI    SSSOSHLD,B'10000000'                                0830 02965000
*             SSSOSCLS=ON;          /* SELECT DATA SETS      @Y30OE73   02966000
*                                      BY SYSOUT CLASS       @Y30OE73*/ 02967000
@RF00829 DS    0H                                                  0832 02968000
*             SSSOSPGM=ON;          /* USE PROGRAM NAME      @Y30OE73   02969000
*                                      TO SELEST DATA SETS   @Y30OE73*/ 02970000
         OI    SSSOSCLS,B'01000100'                                0832 02971000
*             SSSOFLG2=ZERO;        /* CLEAR FLAGS FOR       @Y30OE73   02972000
*                                      DISPOSITION OF D S    @Y30OE73*/ 02973000
         MVI   SSSOFLG2,X'00'                                      0833 02974000
*             SSOBRETN=ZERO;        /* CLEAR SSREQ RETN CD   @Y30OE73*/ 02975000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0834 02976000
         ST    @14,SSOBRETN                                        0834 02977000
*             WTRCODE=NOERROR;      /* RESET WTRCODE         @Y30OE73   02978000
*                                      SO PROCESSING CAN     @Y30OE73   02979000
*                                      CONTINUE              @Y30OE73*/ 02980000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'00'                                       0835 02981000
*           END;                    /* END RESET SSSO        @Y30OE73*/ 02982000
*     ELSE                                                         0837 02983000
*       ;                           /* FOR END OF DATA SET   @Y30OE73   02984000
*                                      DON'T DO ANYTHING     @Y30OE73*/ 02985000
@RF00817 DS    0H                                                  0838 02986000
*   ELSE                            /* WTR PROCESSING MULTI  @Z30OE73   02987000
*                                      DATA SET MODE         @Z30OE73*/ 02988000
*     IF SSOBRETN¬=SSSOEODS THEN    /* IS IT OTHER THAN      @Z30OE73   02989000
*                                      NO MORE DATA SETS     @Z30OE73*/ 02990000
         B     @RC00816                                            0838 02991000
@RF00816 L     @14,SSOBRETN                                        0838 02992000
         CH    @14,@CH00067                                        0838 02993000
         BE    @RF00838                                            0838 02994000
*       IF SSOBRETN¬=SSSOINVA THEN  /* IS IT AN UNCORR       @Y30OE73   02995000
*                                      ABLE ERROR            @Y30OE73*/ 02996000
         CH    @14,@CH00033                                        0839 02997000
         BE    @RF00839                                            0839 02998000
*         DO;                       /* YES                   @Y30OE73*/ 02999000
*           SAVESSRC=SSOBRETN;      /* SAVE SSREQ RETN CD    @Y30OE73*/ 03000000
         ST    @14,SAVESSRC                                        0841 03001000
*           CALL SYSERMSG;          /* WRITE MSG'S 577I+581E #Y30OE73*/ 03002000
         BAL   @14,SYSERMSG                                        0842 03003000
*         END;                      /* END ISSUE ERR MSG     @Y30OE73*/ 03004000
*       ELSE                        /* MUST BE INVALID       #Y30OE73   03005000
*                                      SEARCH ARGUMENTS      #Y30OE73*/ 03006000
*         IF SAVESSRC=SSSOINVA THEN /* SECOND ERR            #Y30OE73   03007000
*                                      OF INVALID SEARCH ARGS      0844 03008000
*                                                            #Y30OE73*/ 03009000
         B     @RC00839                                            0844 03010000
@RF00839 CLC   SAVESSRC(4),@CF00033                                0844 03011000
         BNE   @RF00844                                            0844 03012000
*           CALL SYSERMSG;          /* WRITE MSG'S 577I+581E #Y30OE73*/ 03013000
         BAL   @14,SYSERMSG                                        0845 03014000
*         ELSE                      /* FIRST TIME SO RESET   #Y30OE73   03015000
*                                      SEARCH ARGUMENTS      #Y30OE73*/ 03016000
*           DO;                     /* RESET ARG'S           #Y30OE73*/ 03017000
         B     @RC00844                                            0846 03018000
@RF00844 DS    0H                                                  0847 03019000
*             SAVESSRC=SSOBRETN;    /* SAVE ERROR            #Y30OE73*/ 03020000
         MVC   SAVESSRC(4),SSOBRETN                                0847 03021000
*             SSSOUFLG=ZERO;        /* CLEAR USER OPTIONS    #Y30OE73   03022000
*                                      CLASS ROUTING FLGS    #Y30OE73*/ 03023000
         MVI   SSSOUFLG,X'00'                                      0848 03024000
*             SSOBRETN=ZERO;        /* CLEAR SSREQ RETN CD   @Y30OE73*/ 03025000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0849 03026000
         ST    @14,SSOBRETN                                        0849 03027000
*             IF SSIDCODE=JES2SS    /* INDICATOR FOR JES2    @ZA29643*/ 03028000
*               THEN                /* YES                   @ZA04482*/ 03029000
         CLI   SSIDCODE,X'04'                                      0850 03030000
         BNE   @RF00850                                            0850 03031000
*               SSSOSHLD=ON;        /* SET TO SELECT HELD    @Y30OE73   03032000
*                                      DATA SETS             @Y30OE73*/ 03033000
         OI    SSSOSHLD,B'10000000'                                0851 03034000
*             SSSOSCLS=ON;          /* SELECT BY CLASS       @Y30OE73*/ 03035000
@RF00850 DS    0H                                                  0853 03036000
*             SSSOSPGM=ON;          /* SELECT BY WTR NAME    @Y30OE73*/ 03037000
         OI    SSSOSCLS,B'01000100'                                0853 03038000
*             IF SSSOJOBN=JOBNSAVE& /* WAS LAST REQ          @X30OE73*/ 03039000
*                 SSSOJOBI=JOBISAVE THEN/* A PRIMARY         @X30OE73   03040000
*                                      SUBSYSTEM REQ         @Y30OE73*/ 03041000
         CLC   SSSOJOBN(8),JOBNSAVE                                0854 03042000
         BNE   @RF00854                                            0854 03043000
         CLC   SSSOJOBI(8),JOBISAVE                                0854 03044000
         BNE   @RF00854                                            0854 03045000
*               DO;                 /* YES                   @Y30OE73*/ 03046000
*                 SSSOSJBN=ON;      /* SELECT BY JOBNAM      @Y30OE73*/ 03047000
         OI    SSSOSJBN,B'00010000'                                0856 03048000
*                 IF SSIDCODE=JES2SS THEN/* JES2             @ZA04482*/ 03049000
         CLI   SSIDCODE,X'04'                                      0857 03050000
         BNE   @RF00857                                            0857 03051000
*                   SSSOSJBI=ON;    /* SELECT BY JOB ID      @Y30OE73*/ 03052000
         OI    SSSOSJBI,B'00001000'                                0858 03053000
*                 WTRCODE=NOERROR;  /* SET RTN CODE          @Z30OE73   03054000
*                                      SO WTR WILL MAKE      @Z30OE73   03055000
*                                      ANOTHER SEC REQ       @Z30OE73   03056000
*                                      TO RETRY SSREQ        @Z30OE73*/ 03057000
@RF00857 MVI   WTRCODE,X'00'                                       0859 03058000
*               END;                /* END SET FOR SEC REQ   #Y30OE73*/ 03059000
*             ELSE                  /* MAKE IT A PRIMARY     @Z30OE73   03060000
*                                      REQUEST               #Y30OE73*/ 03061000
*               DO;                 /*                       @Z30OE73*/ 03062000
         B     @RC00854                                            0861 03063000
@RF00854 DS    0H                                                  0862 03064000
*                 SSOBRETN=SSSOEODS;/* SET SSREQ             @Z30OE73   03065000
*                                      SO PRIMARY REQ WILL   @Z30OE73   03066000
*                                      BE MADE               @Z30OE73*/ 03067000
         MVC   SSOBRETN(4),@CF00067                                0862 03068000
*                 SSSOSJBN=ON;      /* SET JOB NAME FLG      @Z30OE73*/ 03069000
         OI    SSSOSJBN,B'00010000'                                0863 03070000
*                 IF SSIDCODE=JES2SS THEN/* FOR JES2         @ZA04482*/ 03071000
         CLI   SSIDCODE,X'04'                                      0864 03072000
         BNE   @RF00864                                            0864 03073000
*                   SSSOSJBI=ON;    /* SET JOB NAME          @ZA04482   03074000
*                                      SYSOUT CLASSES        @Z30OE73*/ 03075000
         OI    SSSOSJBI,B'00001000'                                0865 03076000
*               END;                /*                       @Z30OE73*/ 03077000
*           END;                    /* END RESET ARG'S       #Y30OE73*/ 03078000
*     ELSE                                                         0868 03079000
*       ;                           /* MULTI DATA SET MODE   @Z30OE73   03080000
*                                      CLEANUP WILL HANDLE   #Y30OE73   03081000
*                                      END OF DATA SETS      @Z30OE73*/ 03082000
@RF00838 DS    0H                                                  0869 03083000
*   END PROCSSRC;                   /*                       #Y30OE73*/ 03084000
@EL00008 DS    0H                                                  0869 03085000
@EF00008 DS    0H                                                  0869 03086000
@ER00008 LM    @14,@12,@SA00008                                    0869 03087000
         BR    @14                                                 0869 03088000
*                                                                  0870 03089000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03090000
*/*  ******************************************************* #Y30OE73*/ 03091000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03092000
*/*        FUNCTION:                                         #Y30OE73*/ 03093000
*/*       TO PROCESS SUBSYSTEM INTERFACE RETURN CODES FOR    #Y30OE73*/ 03094000
*/*       FOR BAD SSOB'S LOGICAL ERRORS RECOVERY IS          #Y30OE73*/ 03095000
*/*       ATTEMPTED ONCE                                     #Y30OE73*/ 03096000
*/*         FOR ALL OTHER ERRORS THE WRITER IS TERMINATED +  @Z30OE73*/ 03097000
*/*         THE MESSAGES IEB577I AND IEB581E ISSUED          #Y30OE73*/ 03098000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03099000
*/*       INPUT:                                             #Y30OE73*/ 03100000
*/*       -- REGISTER 15 CONTAINS RETURN CODE ( SEE MAP OF   #Y30OE73*/ 03101000
*/*           SSOB )                                         #Y30OE73*/ 03102000
*/*            SSRTNSUP - SUBSYSTEM DOES NOT SUPPORT THIS    #Y30OE73*/ 03103000
*/*            FUNCTION                                      #Y30OE73*/ 03104000
*/*            SSRTNTUP - SUBSYSTEM EXIST BUT IS NOTTUP      #Y30OE73*/ 03105000
*/*            SSRTNOSS - SUBSYSTEM DOES ONT EXIST           #Y30OE73*/ 03106000
*/*            SSRTDIST - FUNCTION NOT COMPLETED DISASTROUS  #Y30OE73*/ 03107000
*/*            ERROR                                         #Y30OE73*/ 03108000
*/*            SSRTLERR - LOGICAL ERROR (BAD SSOB,FORMAT     #Y30OE73*/ 03109000
*/*            LENGTH....)                                   #Y30OE73*/ 03110000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03111000
*/*        OUTPUT:                                           #Y30OE73*/ 03112000
*/*        -- FOR RTN CODES OF 4(FUNCTION NOT SUPPORTED),    #Y30OE73*/ 03113000
*/*           8(SUBSYS NOT UP),12(SUB SYS DOES NOT EXIST ),  #Y30OE73*/ 03114000
*/*           AND 16(DISTASTROUS ERROR) MSG IEB577I AND IEB581E      */ 03115000
*/*           IEB581E AND ISSUED                             #Y30OE73*/ 03116000
*/*        -- FOR RTN CODE 20( LOGICAL ERROR ) RETRY ONCE    #Y30OE73*/ 03117000
*/*           AND THEN ISSUE THE MSG'S IF RETRY FAILS        #Y30OE73*/ 03118000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03119000
*/*  ******************************************************  #Y30OE73*/ 03120000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03121000
*                                                                  0870 03122000
*SSIERRRT:                          /* SUBSYSTEM INTERFACE   #Y30OE73*/ 03123000
*   PROC;                           /* ERROR PROCESSING CODE #Y30OE73*/ 03124000
SSIERRRT STM   @14,@12,@SA00009                                    0870 03125000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03126000
*                                                                  0871 03127000
*   IF RTNCDREG=SSRTNSUP|           /* TEST IF MSG IEB577I   #Y30OE73*/ 03128000
*       RTNCDREG=SSRTNTUP|          /* AND MSG IEB581E       #Y30OE73*/ 03129000
*       RTNCDREG=SSRTNOSS|          /* SHOULD BE ISSUED      #Y30OE73*/ 03130000
*       RTNCDREG=SSRTDIST|          /*                       #Y30OE73*/ 03131000
*       RTNCDREG=SAVSSIRC THEN      /*                       @Z30OE73*/ 03132000
         CH    RTNCDREG,@CH00067                                   0871 03133000
         BE    @RT00871                                            0871 03134000
         CH    RTNCDREG,@CH00062                                   0871 03135000
         BE    @RT00871                                            0871 03136000
         CH    RTNCDREG,@CH00033                                   0871 03137000
         BE    @RT00871                                            0871 03138000
         CH    RTNCDREG,@CH00058                                   0871 03139000
         BE    @RT00871                                            0871 03140000
         C     RTNCDREG,SAVSSIRC                                   0871 03141000
         BNE   @RF00871                                            0871 03142000
@RT00871 DS    0H                                                  0872 03143000
*     DO;                           /* YES ISSUE MSGS        @Z30OE73*/ 03144000
*       SAVSSIRC=RTNCDREG;          /* SAVE ERROR RTN CODE   @Z30OE73*/ 03145000
         ST    RTNCDREG,SAVSSIRC                                   0873 03146000
*       WTRCODE=SSIERROR;           /* SET WTR RTN CODE FOR  #Y30OE73   03147000
*                                      SUB SYS INTERFACE ERR #Y30OE73*/ 03148000
         MVI   WTRCODE,X'10'                                       0874 03149000
*       CALL SYSERMSG;              /* CALL RTN TO WRITE     #Y30OE73   03150000
*                                      MSG 577 AND 581       #Y30OE73*/ 03151000
         BAL   @14,SYSERMSG                                        0875 03152000
*       WRTDSFLG=OFF;               /* STOP WRITING DATA     #Y30OE73   03153000
*                                      SETS TO DISKETTE      #Y30OE73*/ 03154000
         NI    WRTDSFLG,B'11011111'                                0876 03155000
*     END;                          /* END MSG WRITING       #Y30OE73*/ 03156000
*   ELSE                            /* RESET SSOB TO RETRY   #Y30OE73*/ 03157000
*     DO;                           /* DO RESET              #Y30OE73*/ 03158000
         B     @RC00871                                            0878 03159000
@RF00871 DS    0H                                                  0879 03160000
*       SAVSSIRC=RTNCDREG;          /* SAVE RTN CDE TO CK    @Z30OE73   03161000
*                                      SECOND ERROR          @Z30OE73*/ 03162000
         ST    RTNCDREG,SAVSSIRC                                   0879 03163000
*       SSREQLST=ADDR(SSOB);        /* INIT SSR LIST WITH    #Y30OE73   03164000
*                                      SSOB PTR              #Y30OE73*/ 03165000
         LA    @14,SSOB                                            0880 03166000
         ST    @14,SSREQLST                                        0880 03167000
*       SSREQEND=ON;                /* INDICATE ONLY 1 SSOB  #Y30OE73*/ 03168000
         OI    SSREQEND,B'10000000'                                0881 03169000
*       SSOBID=SSOBCHAR;            /* SET EYE CATCHER IN    #Y30OE73   03170000
*                                      SSOB                  #Y30OE73*/ 03171000
         MVC   SSOBID(4),SSOBCHAR                                  0882 03172000
*       SSOBLEN=LENGTH(SSOB);       /* RESET SSOB LENGTH     #Y30OE73*/ 03173000
         MVC   SSOBLEN(2),@CH00168                                 0883 03174000
*       SSOBFUNC=SSOBSOUT;          /* SET FUNCTION TO       #Y30OE73   03175000
*                                      PROCESS SYSOUT        #Y30OE73*/ 03176000
         MVC   SSOBFUNC(2),@CH00070                                0884 03177000
*       SSOBSSIB=ZERO;              /* SET SSIB PTR TO ZERO  #Y30OE73*/ 03178000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0885 03179000
         ST    @14,SSOBSSIB                                        0885 03180000
*       SSOBRETN=ZERO;              /* CLEAR SSOB RTN CODE   #Y30OE73*/ 03181000
         ST    @14,SSOBRETN                                        0886 03182000
*     END;                          /* END SSOB RESET        #Y30OE73*/ 03183000
*   END SSIERRRT;                   /* END SSI ERROR RTN     #Y30OE73*/ 03184000
@EL00009 DS    0H                                                  0888 03185000
@EF00009 DS    0H                                                  0888 03186000
@ER00009 LM    @14,@12,@SA00009                                    0888 03187000
         BR    @14                                                 0888 03188000
*                                                                  0889 03189000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03190000
*/*  ******************************************************  #Y30OE73*/ 03191000
*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03192000
*/*       RTN TO WRITE OUT ERROR MESSAGES FOR SYSTEM AND     #Y30OE73*/ 03193000

*/*                                                          #Y30OE73*/ 03208000

         MVI   M577IKEY,X'0C'                                      0894 03229000
*   IF WTRCODE=SSIERROR|            /* FOR SSI ERROR SET     @Y30OE73*/ 03230000

*   ELSE                            /* MUST BE ALLOC ERR     @Y30OE73*/ 03240000

*   CALL IOEDKMSG;                  /* WRITE MSG IEB577I     @Y30OE73*/ 03247000
         L     @15,@CV03341                                        0899 03248000

*/*                                                          @Y30OE73*/ 03254000

         CLI   WTRCODE,16                                          0911 03289000

./  ADD  SSI=42540226,NAME=IOEESTAE
         TITLE 'IOEESTAE-ESTAE 3540 UCB CLEANUP ROUTINE                *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IOEESTAE CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IOEESTAE  74.254'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @10,@01                                             0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@10                                           0001 00017000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00018000
*   WORKFLAG=ZERO;                  /* RESET PROGRAM SWITCH  @Y30OE6D*/ 00019000
         MVI   WORKFLAG,X'00'                                      0036 00020000
*   SDWAPTR=REG1;                   /* SAVE SDWA ADDR        @Y30OE6D*/ 00021000
         LR    SDWAPTR,REG1                                        0037 00022000
*   IF REG0¬=CODE12                 /* IF SDWA IS NOT        @Y30OE6D*/ 00023000
*     THEN                          /* PRESENT               @Y30OE6D*/ 00024000
         C     REG0,CODE12                                         0038 00025000
         BE    @RF00038                                            0038 00026000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00027000
*       PARMPTR=SDWAPARM;           /* GET PTR TO PARM LIST  @Y30OE6D*/ 00028000
         L     PARMPTR,SDWAPARM(,SDWAPTR)                          0040 00029000
*       FREESDWA=ON;                /* SET FREEMAIN IND ON   @Y30OE6D*/ 00030000
         OI    FREESDWA,B'10000000'                                0041 00031000
*     END;                          /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00032000
*   RFY                             /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00033000
*    (REG0,                         /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00034000
*     REG1) UNRSTD;                 /* RELEASE REGISTERS     @Y30OE6D*/ 00035000
@RF00038 DS    0H                                                  0044 00036000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0044 00037000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00038000
        MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP  GET PGM IN KEY ZERO        @Y30OE6D  00039000
*   DO I=1 TO 2;                    /* LOOP FOR 2 UCBS       @Y30OE6D*/ 00040000
         LA    I,1                                                 0045 00041000
@DL00045 DS    0H                                                  0046 00042000
*     IF PARMLIST(I)¬=ZEROES        /* IF PTR IS AN ADDR     @Y30OE6D*/ 00043000
*       THEN                        /* THEN SETUP TO CLEAN   @Y30OE6D*/ 00044000
         LR    @09,I                                               0046 00045000
         SLA   @09,2                                               0046 00046000
         AL    @09,@CF01072                                        0046 00047000
         L     @09,PARMLIST(@09,PARMPTR)                           0046 00048000
         CL    @09,ZEROES                                          0046 00049000
         BE    @RF00046                                            0046 00050000
*       DO;                         /* UCBS                  @Y30OE6D*/ 00051000
*         UCBPTR=PARMLIST(I);       /* GET UCB ADDR          @Y30OE6D*/ 00052000
         LR    UCBPTR,@09                                          0048 00053000
*         LOCKREG=ADDR(UCBLOCK);    /* GET UCB LOCKWORD      @Y30OE6D*/ 00054000
         LR    LOCKREG,UCBPTR                                      0049 00055000
         AL    LOCKREG,@CF01073                                    0049 00056000
*         GENERATE;                                                0050 00057000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00058000
        SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=IOSUCB,ADDR=(11),MODE=UNCOND,             XX00059000
               REGS=USE,RELATED=(UCB,(IOEESTAE,LOCKUCB))      @Y30OE6D  00060000
*         UCBVLSER=''B;             /* ZERO VOL SER          @Y30OE6D*/ 00061000
         L     @09,UCBXTADR(,UCBPTR)                               0051 00062000
         XC    UCBVLSER(6,@09),UCBVLSER(@09)                       0051 00063000
*         UCBVLVER=OFF;             /* RESET VOL VERIFY IND  @Y30OE6D*/ 00064000
*         UCBDKAMX=OFF;             /* RESET 3540 A.M. IND   @Y30OE6D*/ 00065000
         NI    UCBVLVER(@09),B'00111111'                           0053 00066000
*         LOCKREG=ADDR(UCBLOCK);    /* GET UCB LOCKWORD      @Y30OE6D*/ 00067000
         LR    LOCKREG,UCBPTR                                      0054 00068000
         AL    LOCKREG,@CF01073                                    0054 00069000
*         GENERATE;                                                0055 00070000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00071000
        SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=IOSUCB,ADDR=(11),REGS=USE,               XX00072000
               RELATED=(UCB,(IOEESTAE,UNLOCKUCB))             @Y30OE6D  00073000
*       END;                        /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00074000
*   END;                            /*                       @Y30OE6D*/ 00075000
@RF00046 AH    I,@CH00049                                          0057 00076000
         CH    I,@CH00078                                          0057 00077000
         BNH   @DL00045                                            0057 00078000
*   IF FREESDWA=ON                  /* IF A WORK AREA WAS    @Y30OE6D*/ 00079000
*     THEN                          /* PROVIDED, FREE IT     @Y30OE6D*/ 00080000
         TM    FREESDWA,B'10000000'                                0058 00081000
         BNO   @RF00058                                            0058 00082000
*     GENERATE REFS(SDWARCDE);                                     0059 00083000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00084000
        SETRP WKAREA=(SDWAPTR)     FREE  THE SDWA             @Y30OE6D  00085000
*     GENERATE;                                                    0060 00086000
@RF00058 DS    0H                                                  0060 00087000
*                                                         /*@Y30OE6D*/  00088000

*     REG15=''B;                    /* SET RETURN CODE ZERO  @Y30OE6D*/ 00090000
         SLR   REG15,REG15                                         0061 00091000
*   END IOEESTAE                    /* END OF PROGRAM        @Y30OE6D*/ 00092000
*                                                                  0062 00093000

@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0062 00100000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0062 00101000
         LR    @01,@10                                             0062 00102000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00103000

@DATD    DSECT                                                          00115000

         ORG   WORKFLAG                                                 00118000

./  ADD  SSI=61260167,NAME=IOESDKTI
         TITLE 'IOESDKTI-3540 SETDISKT INPUT SERVICES                  *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IOESDKTI CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IOESDKTI  76.126'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  LA    @10,4095(,@12)                                      0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
         USING @PSTART+4095,@10                                    0001 00014000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00015000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00016000
         LR    @08,@01                                             0001 00017000
         USING @DATD,@08                                           0001 00018000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00019000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00020000
         ST    @08,8(,@13)                                         0001 00021000
         LR    @13,@08                                             0001 00022000
*   SETDSKPT=REG1;                  /* SET SETDISKT POINTER  @Y30OEAC*/ 00023000
         LR    SETDSKPT,REG1                                       0096 00024000
*   DCBPTR=SDKTDCB;                 /* SET POINTER TO DCB    @Y30OEAC*/ 00025000
         L     @03,SDKTDCB(,SETDSKPT)                              0097 00026000
         ST    @03,DCBPTR                                          0097 00027000
*   AMWRKPTR=DCBAMWKA;              /* SET AM WORK AREA PTR  @Y30OEAC*/ 00028000
         SLR   AMWRKPTR,AMWRKPTR                                   0098 00029000
         ICM   AMWRKPTR,7,DCBAMWKA+16(@03)                         0098 00030000
*   DEBPTR=DCBDEBAD;                /* SET POINTER TO DEB    @Y30OEAC*/ 00031000
         L     DEBPTR,DCBDEBAD+40(,@03)                            0099 00032000
*   UCBPTR=DEBSUCBA;                /* SET POINTER TO UCB    @Y30OEAC*/ 00033000
         MVC   UCBPTR(4),DEBSUCBA(DEBPTR)                          0100 00034000
*   IOBSTPTR=IOBPTR;                /* SET POINTER TO IOB    @Y30OE95*/ 00035000
         SLR   IOBSTPTR,IOBSTPTR                                   0101 00036000
         ICM   IOBSTPTR,7,IOBPTR(AMWRKPTR)                         0101 00037000
*   SIOB1PTR=IOBSTPTR;              /* SAVE IOB POINTER      @Y30OE95*/ 00038000
         ST    IOBSTPTR,SIOB1PTR(,AMWRKPTR)                        0102 00039000
*   CHNPGMPT=IOBSTART;              /* PTR TO CHANNEL PGM    @Y30OEAC*/ 00040000
         L     CHNPGMPT,IOBSTART(,IOBSTPTR)                        0103 00041000
*   VOL1PTR=CHANPGM(3,2:4);         /* SET VOL1 LABEL PTR    @Y30OEAC*/ 00042000
         SLR   VOL1PTR,VOL1PTR                                     0104 00043000
         ICM   VOL1PTR,7,CHANPGM+17(CHNPGMPT)                      0104 00044000
*   SETRETCD=CLEAR;                 /* CLEAR RETURN CODE     @Y30OEAC*/ 00045000
         MVC   SETRETCD(2,SETDSKPT),CLEAR                          0105 00046000
*   RFY                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00047000
*    (DEBPTR,                       /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00048000
*     REG1) UNRSTD;                 /* RELEASE REGISTER      @Y30OEAC*/ 00049000
*                                                                  0107 00050000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OEAC*/ 00051000
*/*                                                          @Y30OEAC*/ 00052000
*/* SETDISKT INPUT SERVICES                                  @Y30OEAC*/ 00053000
*/*                                                          @Y30OEAC*/ 00054000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OEAC*/ 00055000
*                                                                  0107 00056000
*SETDIN:                                                           0107 00057000
*   DO;                             /* SETDIN:CASE(SETOPCDE)NAMES(OPE   00058000
*                                      NDS,EOV,CLOSEDS,FEED)         */ 00059000
SETDIN   DS    0H                                                  0108 00060000
*     DCL                                                          0108 00061000
*       CL0001@ LABEL BASED(CP0001@(SETOPCDE)) VALUERANGE(OPENDS,EOV,   00062000
*           CLOSEDS,FEED);          /* BRANCH TARGET                 */ 00063000
*     DCL                                                          0109 00064000
*       CP0001@(4) PTR(31) INIT(ADDR(OPENDS),ADDR(EOV),ADDR(CLOSEDS),   00065000
*           ADDR(FEED));                                           0109 00066000
*     GOTO CL0001@;                 /* BRANCH TO SELECTED CASE     0110 00067000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00068000
*                                                                  0110 00069000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0110 00070000
         IC    @11,SETOPCDE(,SETDSKPT)                             0110 00071000
         SLA   @11,2                                               0110 00072000
         L     @11,CP0001@-4(@11)                                  0110 00073000
         BR    @11                                                 0110 00074000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00075000
*     /*                                                             */ 00076000
*     /* OPEN DATA SET                                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00077000
*     /*                                                             */ 00078000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00079000
*                                                                  0111 00080000
*OPENDS:                                                           0111 00081000
*     DO;                           /* SUBCASE               @Y30OEAC*/ 00082000
OPENDS   DS    0H                                                  0112 00083000
*LOOP1:                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00084000
*       FEEDREAD=OFF;               /* NO FEED REQUEST       @Y30OE95*/ 00085000
LOOP1    NI    FEEDREAD(AMWRKPTR),B'11111011'                      0112 00086000
*       CALL RDLABTRK;              /* READ THE LABEL TRACK  @Y30OE95*/ 00087000
         BAL   @14,RDLABTRK                                        0113 00088000
*       IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN          /* NO ERRORS ?           @Y30OE95*/ 00089000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00090000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0114 00091000
         BNE   @RF00114                                            0114 00092000
*         DO;                       /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00093000
*           CALL VOL1LABL;          /* PROCESS VOL1 LABEL    @Y30OE95*/ 00094000
         BAL   @14,VOL1LABL                                        0116 00095000
*           IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN      /* NO ERRORS ?           @Y30OE95*/ 00096000
*             THEN                  /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00097000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0117 00098000
         BNE   @RF00117                                            0117 00099000
*             DO;                   /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00100000
*               AMWVOLAC=VOLACCIN;  /* PUT VOL ACC IND DEB   @Y30OEAC*/ 00101000
         MVC   AMWVOLAC(1,AMWRKPTR),VOLACCIN(VOL1PTR)              0119 00102000
*               IF AMWVOLAC¬=BLANK  /* ACCESS CODE REQUIRED? @Y30OEAC*/ 00103000
*                 THEN              /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00104000
         CLI   AMWVOLAC(AMWRKPTR),C' '                             0120 00105000
         BE    @RF00120                                            0120 00106000
*                 IF AMWVAMSG=OFF   /* MESSAGE NOT ISSUED    @Y30OEAC*/ 00107000
*                   THEN            /* FOR THIS VOLUME ?     @Y30OE95*/ 00108000
         TM    AMWVAMSG(AMWRKPTR),B'00100000'                      0121 00109000
         BNZ   @RF00121                                            0121 00110000
*                   IF SDKTDSID¬=BLNKDSID/* NON-BLANK DSID ? @Y30OEAC*/ 00111000
*                     THEN          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00112000
         CLC   SDKTDSID(8,SETDSKPT),BLNKDSID                       0122 00113000
         BE    @RF00122                                            0122 00114000
*                     DO;           /* ISSUE SECURE VOL MSG  @Y30OEAC*/ 00115000
*                       AMWVAMSG=ON;/* SET MSG ISSUED IND    @Y30OEAC*/ 00116000
         OI    AMWVAMSG(AMWRKPTR),B'00100000'                      0124 00117000
*                       SECVOL=ON;  /* SET VOL SECURITY IND  @Y30OEAC*/ 00118000
         OI    SECVOL(AMWRKPTR),B'00100000'                        0125 00119000
*                       CALL SECRPROC;/* SECURITY PROCESSING @Y30OEAC*/ 00120000
         BAL   @14,SECRPROC                                        0126 00121000
*                     END;          /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00122000
*               IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN  /* NO ERRORS ?           @Y30OEAC*/ 00123000
*                 THEN              /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00124000
@RF00122 DS    0H                                                  0128 00125000
@RF00121 DS    0H                                                  0128 00126000
@RF00120 CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0128 00127000
         BNE   @RF00128                                            0128 00128000
*                 DO;               /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00129000
*                   AMWVSEQU=ZERO;  /* ZERO DEB VOL SEQ NUM  @Y30OEAC*/ 00130000
         MVI   AMWVSEQU(AMWRKPTR),X'00'                            0130 00131000
*                   CALL HDR1LABL;  /* PROCESS HDR1 LABEL    @Y30OE95*/ 00132000
         BAL   @14,HDR1LABL                                        0131 00133000
*                   IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN/* NO ERRORS ?         @Y30OE95*/ 00134000
*                     THEN          /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00135000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0132 00136000
         BNE   @RF00132                                            0132 00137000
*                     DO;           /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00138000
*                       HDR1PTR=HDR1SAV;/* SET POINTER TO HDR1     0134 00139000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00140000
         L     HDR1PTR,HDR1SAV(,AMWRKPTR)                          0134 00141000
*                       IF(HDRVOLSQ>=CHAR01&/* VOL SEQ NUMBER      0135 00142000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00143000
*                           HDRVOLSQ<=CHAR99&/* BETWEEN 01   @ZA04456*/ 00144000
*                           HDRVOLSQ(2)>=NUMBER0&/* AND      @ZA04456*/ 00145000
*                           HDRVOLSQ(2)<=NUMBER9)|/* 99 ?    @ZA04483*/ 00146000
*                           (HDRMVLI=LASTVOL&/* LAST VOL IND AND   0135 00147000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00148000
*                           HDRVOLSQ=BLNKVLSQ)/* BLNK VOL SEQ ?    0135 00149000

*                         THEN      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00151000

         BL    @GL00001                                            0135 00153000

         BL    @GL00001                                            0135 00157000
         CLI   HDRVOLSQ+1(HDR1PTR),C'9'                            0135 00158000
         BNH   @RT00135                                            0135 00159000
@GL00001 CLI   HDRMVLI(HDR1PTR),C'L'                               0135 00160000
         BNE   @RF00135                                            0135 00161000
         CLC   HDRVOLSQ(2,HDR1PTR),BLNKVLSQ                        0135 00162000
         BNE   @RF00135                                            0135 00163000
@RT00135 DS    0H                                                  0136 00164000
*                         IF HDRVOLSQ¬=CHAR01/* VOL SEQ NUMBER     0136 00165000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00166000
*                           THEN    /* NOT EQUAL TO 01 ?     @Y30OEAC*/ 00167000
         CLC   HDRVOLSQ(2,HDR1PTR),CHAR01                          0136 00168000
         BE    @RF00136                                            0136 00169000
*                           DO;     /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00170000
*                             CALL SEQERR;/* ISSUE SEQ ERROR MSG   0138 00171000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00172000
         BAL   @14,SEQERR                                          0138 00173000
*                             IF ERTNCDE¬=OPERCNCL/* JOB NOT @Y30OEAC*/ 00174000
*                               THEN/* CANCELED BY OPERATOR? @Y30OEAC*/ 00175000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'18'                             0139 00176000
         BNE   @RT00139                                            0139 00177000
*                               GOTO LOOP1;/* RETRY          @Y30OEAC*/ 00178000
*                           END;    /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00179000
*                         ELSE      /* VOL SEQ NUM = 01      @Y30OEAC*/ 00180000
*                           IF HDRMVLI=LASTVOL/* LAST VOL IND ?    0142 00181000

*                             THEN  /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00183000
         B     @RC00136                                            0142 00184000
@RF00136 CLI   HDRMVLI(HDR1PTR),C'L'                               0142 00185000

*                             ERTNCDE=BADHDR1;/* BAD HDR1 RTN CD   0143 00187000

*                       CALL VALIDHDR;/* CHECK FOR VALID HDR1      0144 00190000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00191000
@RF00142 DS    0H                                                  0144 00192000
@RC00136 DS    0H                                                  0144 00193000
@RF00135 BAL   @14,VALIDHDR                                        0144 00194000
*                       IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN/* NO ERRORS ?     @Y30OE95*/ 00195000
*                         THEN      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00196000
         CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0145 00197000
         BNE   @RF00145                                            0145 00198000
*                         DO;       /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00199000
*                           AMWDSSQL=HDRSECIN;/* DS SEC IN DEB     0147 00200000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00201000
         MVC   AMWDSSQL(1,AMWRKPTR),HDRSECIN(HDR1PTR)              0147 00202000
*                           IF AMWDSOPN=OFF&/* DS NOT OPEN ? @Y30OEAC*/ 00203000
*                               VOLACCIN¬=BLANK&/* VOL ACC IND?    0148 00204000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00205000
*                               HDRSECIN¬=BLANK/* HDR1 SEC IND ?   0148 00206000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00207000
*                             THEN  /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00208000
         TM    AMWDSOPN(AMWRKPTR),B'01000000'                      0148 00209000
         BNZ   @RF00148                                            0148 00210000
         CLI   VOLACCIN(VOL1PTR),C' '                              0148 00211000
         BE    @RF00148                                            0148 00212000
         CLI   HDRSECIN(HDR1PTR),C' '                              0148 00213000
         BE    @RF00148                                            0148 00214000
*                             DO;   /* ISSUE SECURE DS MSG   @Y30OE95*/ 00215000
*                               SECVOL=OFF;/* SET SECUR VOL IND    0150 00216000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00217000
         NI    SECVOL(AMWRKPTR),B'11011111'                        0150 00218000
*                               CALL SECRPROC;/* SECUR PROCESS     0151 00219000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00220000
         BAL   @14,SECRPROC                                        0151 00221000
*                             END;  /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00222000
*                           IF ERTNCDE=GOODRTN/* NO ERRORS ? @Y30OEAC*/ 00223000
*                             THEN  /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00224000
@RF00148 CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'00'                             0153 00225000
         BNE   @RF00153                                            0153 00226000
*                             DO;   /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00227000
*                               CALL DEBIOB;/* UPDATE DEB/IOB      0155 00228000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00229000
         BAL   @14,DEBIOB                                          0155 00230000
*                               CALL PRIMEBFR;/* PRIME BUFFER      0156 00231000
*                                                            @Y30OE95*/ 00232000
         BAL   @14,PRIMEBFR                                        0156 00233000
*                               ACBLRECL=CONVERT1;/* PUT REC LEN   0157 00234000

*                                      IN AM WORK AREA       @Y30OEAC*/ 00236000
         MVC   ACBLRECL(2,AMWRKPTR),CONVERT1(AMWRKPTR)             0157 00237000
*                               AMWDSOPN=ON;/* SET DEB DS OPEN     0158 00238000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC   00239000
*                                      FLAG                  @Y30OEAC*/ 00240000
         OI    AMWDSOPN(AMWRKPTR),B'01000000'                      0158 00241000
*                             END;  /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00242000
*                         END;      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00243000
*                       ELSE        /* ERRORS ENCOUNTERED    @Y30OEAC*/ 00244000
*                         IF ERTNCDE=BADHDR1/* BAD HDR1 RTN CD ?   0161 00245000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00246000
*                           THEN    /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00247000
         B     @RC00145                                            0161 00248000
@RF00145 CLI   ERTNCDE(SETDSKPT),X'0C'                             0161 00249000
         BNE   @RF00161                                            0161 00250000
*                           CALL MSGSBRTN;/* ISSUE HDR1 ERROR MSG  0162 00251000
*                                                            @Y30OEAC*/ 00252000
         BAL   @14,MSGSBRTN                                        0162 00253000
*                     END;          /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00254000
*                 END;              /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00255000
*             END;                  /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00256000
*         END;                      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00257000
*       GOTO CE0001@;               /* BRANCH TO END OF CASE         */ 00258000
         B     CE0001@                                             0167 00259000
*     END OPENDS;                   /* END OF SUBCASE                */ 00260000
*/* @Y30OEAC                                                         */ 00261000
*                                                                  0169 00262000
*                                                                  0169 00263000

*     /*                                                             */ 00265000
*     /* END OF VOLUME                                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00266000
*     /*                                                             */ 00267000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00268000
*                                                                  0169 00269000
*EOV:                                                              0169 00270000

*   END SETDIN;                     /* END OF CASE           @Y30OEAC*/ 00515000
*RDLABTRK:                          /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00516000
*   PROC OPTIONS(SAVE(14));         /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00517000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0245 00518000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0245 00519000
         LR    @01,@08                                             0245 00520000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00521000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0245 00522000
         BR    @14                                                 0245 00523000
RDLABTRK ST    @14,@SA00002                                        0245 00524000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OE95*/ 00525000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE95*/ 00526000
*/*  THIS SUBROUTINE READS IN THE LABEL TRACK (TRACK 0) OF A @Y30OE95*/ 00527000
*/*  DISKETTE. IT MAY ALSO CAUSE ANOTHER DISKETTE TO BE FED  @Y30OE95*/ 00528000
*/*  INTO THE READER. UPON ENTRY, THE 'FEEDREAD' BIT OF THE  @Y30OE95*/ 00529000
*/*  WORKAREA IS TURNED OFF IF ONLY A READ IS WANTED OR      @Y30OE95*/ 00530000
*/*  TURNED ON IF A FEED AND READ IS WANTED.                 @Y30OE95*/ 00531000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE95*/ 00532000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OE95*/ 00533000
*                                                                  0246 00534000
*   DCBIFEC=OFF;                    /* SET ERROR CORRECT IND @Y30OEAC*/ 00535000
         L     @11,DCBPTR                                          0246 00536000
         NI    DCBIFEC+40(@11),B'00111111'                         0246 00537000
*   IF¬(VOLLABID=VOL1&              /* LABID ¬= 'VOL1' ?     @Y30OE95*/ 00538000
*       VOLID=UCBVLSER&             /* VOLID ¬= UCBVOLID ?   @Y30OE95*/ 00539000
*       FEEDREAD=OFF)|              /* FEED-READ REQUEST ?   @Y30OE95*/ 00540000
*       SDKTDSID=BLNKDSID           /* DSID NOT SPECIFIED ?  @Y30OE95*/ 00541000
*     THEN                          /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00542000
         CLC   VOLLABID(4,VOL1PTR),VOL1                            0247 00543000
         BNE   @RT00247                                            0247 00544000
         L     @11,UCBPTR                                          0247 00545000
         L     @11,UCBXTADR(,@11)                                  0247 00546000
         CLC   VOLID(6,VOL1PTR),UCBVLSER(@11)                      0247 00547000
         BNE   @RT00247                                            0247 00548000
         TM    FEEDREAD(AMWRKPTR),B'00000100'                      0247 00549000
         BNZ   @RT00247                                            0247 00550000
         CLC   SDKTDSID(8,SETDSKPT),BLNKDSID                       0247 00551000
         BNE   @RF00247                                            0247 00552000
@RT00247 DS    0H                                                  0248 00553000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00554000
*       CHANPGM(1)=CCWDFOP1;        /* CHANGE 1ST NOOP TO A  @Y30OEAC   00555000
*                                      DFN OPS CCW           @Y30OEAC*/ 00556000
         MVC   CHANPGM(8,CHNPGMPT),CCWDFOP1                        0249 00557000
*       IOBSKADR=''B;               /* CLEAR IOB SEEK ADDR   @Y30OEAC*/ 00558000
         XC    IOBSKADR(4,IOBSTPTR),IOBSKADR(IOBSTPTR)             0250 00559000
*       IOBSKSS=VOL1SECT;           /* POINT TO VOL1 LABEL   @Y30OEAC*/ 00560000

*       DO I=3 TO 22;               /* CHANGE BYTE COUNTS OF @Y30OEAC*/ 00562000

@DL00252 DS    0H                                                  0253 00565000
*         CHANPGM(I,7:8)=BYTCNT80;  /* READ CCW'S TO 80      @Y30OEAC*/ 00566000

*       END;                        /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00573000

         CH    @11,@CH01998                                        0254 00577000
         BNH   @DL00252                                            0254 00578000
*       CCW21SAV=CHANPGM(23);       /* SAVE 21ST READ CCW    @Y30OE95*/ 00579000
         MVC   CCW21SAV(8,AMWRKPTR),CHANPGM+176(CHNPGMPT)          0255 00580000
*       CHANPGM(23)=CCWDFOP2;       /* CHANGE 21ST READ      @Y30OEAC   00581000
*                                      CCW TO A DFN OPS CCW  @Y30OEAC*/ 00582000
         MVC   CHANPGM+176(8,CHNPGMPT),CCWDFOP2                    0256 00583000
*       IF FEEDREAD=ON              /* FEED-READ REQUEST ?   @Y30OEAC*/ 00584000
*         THEN                      /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00585000
         TM    FEEDREAD(AMWRKPTR),B'00000100'                      0257 00586000
         BNO   @RF00257                                            0257 00587000
*         DO;                       /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00588000
*           AMWVAMSG=OFF;           /* INDICATE NEW VOLUME   @Y30OEAC*/ 00589000

@DL00297 TM    BADVOLID(AMWRKPTR),B'01000000'                      0297 00686000

*           IF¬(CHARACTR>=CHARA&    /* VOLUME SERIAL CONSIST #Y30OEAC*/ 00688000
*               CHARACTR<=CHARI|    /* OF CHARACTERS OTHER   #Y30OEAC*/ 00689000

*HDR1LABL:                          /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00799000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE);           /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00800000
HDR1LABL DS    0H                                                  0330 00801000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OE95*/ 00802000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE95*/ 00803000
*/* THIS SUBROUTINE WILL CHECK IF THE DATA SET IS LOCATED ON @Y30OE95*/ 00804000
*/* THIS DISKETTE AND MAKE SURE THERE IS NOT MORE THAN ONE   @Y30OE95*/ 00805000
*/* DATA SET WITH THE SAME NAME. IT WILL ALSO CHECK IF THIS  @Y30OE95*/ 00806000
*/* IS A BLANK DISKETTE.                                     @Y30OE95*/ 00807000
*/*                                                          @Y30OE95*/ 00808000
*/********************************************************** @Y30OE95*/ 00809000
*                                                                  0330 00810000
*   RFY                             /*                       @Y30OEAC*/ 00811000
*     REG14 RSTD;                   /* RESTRICT REGISTER     @Y30OEAC*/ 00812000
*   OVERLAP=OFF;                    /* SET OVERLAP IND       @Y30OE95*/ 00813000
*   DSETFND=OFF;                    /* SET DATA SET FND IND  @Y30OE95*/ 00814000
*   DUPDSID=OFF;                    /* SET DUPLICAT DSID IND @Y30OE95*/ 00815000
*   BLNKDSKT=ON;                    /* SET BLANK DSKT IND    @Y30OEAC*/ 00816000
*   ONLYDSET=ON;                    /* SET ONLY DATA SET IND @Y30OEAC*/ 00817000
         OI    BLNKDSKT(AMWRKPTR),B'00000110'                      0335 00818000
         NI    OVERLAP(AMWRKPTR),B'11000111'                       0335 00819000
*   IF SDKTDSID¬=BLNKDSID           /* DSID SPECIFIED ?      @Y30OEAC*/ 00820000

         CLC   SDKTDSID(8,SETDSKPT),BLNKDSID                       0336 00822000

*     DO;                           /*                       @Y30OE95*/ 00824000

         ST    @15,I(,AMWRKPTR)                                    0338 00828000
@DL00338 DS    0H                                                  0339 00829000
*         HDR1PTR=CHANPGM(I,2:4);   /* GET PTR TO HDR1       @Y30OEAC*/ 00830000
